The second loan that the POUWEREOU group has just requested allowed it to stock up in cereal during their period of abundance and to resell it during times of shortage. With the profits, that they will make from the sales, they hope to increase their stock and to ensure good living conditions for their families. This group has a representative named Afoua. She has been in this business for 10 years. For the future, she would like to save and take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy cereal (corn).

loans.name: Cesar

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 2 dos quais frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, barrotes, pedra, porta, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a licenciatura e ampliar mais a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
Tem como desafio trabalhar cada vez mais para pagar o empréstimo sem problemas.
texts.en:
Cesar is married and the father of 3 children, 2 of whom attend School. He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He is a teacher and a permanent employee of the Ministry of Education. With this loan he intends to purchase construction material (cement, sand, beams, stone, doors and others) to continue building his home.

In future he wishes to finish his degree and expand his house and to this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to work increasingly harder to pay off his loan without any problems..

loans.use: purchase construction material (cement, sand, beams, stone, doors and others) to continue building his home.

loans.name: Cristhian Reinaldo

texts.es: Cristhian de estado civil casado tiene 2 hijos. Su negocio lo inicio a raíz que se compro su propio vehículo , la cual trabaja de taxi ejecutivo ya que su mayor problema dice Cristhian que es la delincuencia que existe en el país porque tiene miedo a ser asaltado .ya que labora de 8:00am hasta 23:00pm. Con el préstamo comprara: gasolina y reparar el coche etc.
texts.en: Cristhian is married and has two children.  He started his business when he bought his own vehicle.  He works it as an executive taxi and Cristhian says his greatest difficulty is the country’s crime rate because he fears being robbed since he works from 8am until 11pm.  He will use the loan to buy gasoline and repair his car.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, repair the car, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.pt:
Separado e pai de 5 filhos, 2 dos quais frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É pensionista militar. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas, areia, barrotes, ferro, porta, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
Tem como desafio trabalhar cada vez mais para pagar o empréstimo sem problemas.
texts.en:
Francisco is separated and the father of 5 children, 2 of whom attend School. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He is a military pensioner. With this loan he intends to purchase construction materials (metal sheets, sands, beams, iron, doors and others) to continue the building work on his house.

In future he wishes to complete his house and improve his family's living conditions. To this end, he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to work increasingly harder so as to pay off the loan without any problems.

loans.use: purchase construction materials (metal sheets, sands, beams, iron, doors and others) to continue the building work on his house.

loans.name: Bikedinadou Group

texts.fr: Mère  de 04 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs d’école, madame Essossimna née en 1980 est revendeuse de profession. Son conjoint est agriculteur. En 2003, elle a démarré seule son activité. Elle est à son second crédit à WAGES et ce montant lui servira à acheter  du mais. Notons qu’elle est la responsable de groupement « BIKEDINADOU » constitué de femmes qui font tous le commerce. Avec le profit, elles vont agrandir leurs surfaces cultivables et assurer un avenir meilleur à la famille.
texts.en: Mother of four children, two of which attend school, Essossimna was born in 1980 and is a retailer.  Her husband is a farmer. In 2003 she started her business by herself. She is on her second loan with WAGES and this loan will enable her to buy corn.  She is the manager of the Bikedinadou Group which consists of women who are all merchants.  With their profits, they will expand their arable land and ensure a better future for their families.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Edoé

texts.fr: Ce monsieur a appris l’électronique, en 1991 après sa formation, il fait la réparation d’appareils électroniques à domicile. Beaucoup de gens lui font confiance à cause de la qualité de ses services. En ce moment il a besoin de quelques matériaux pour son activité, il sollicite alors de WAGES un troisième crédit pour pouvoir acheter des accessoires. Âgé de 50ans, Il est marié et père d' 01 enfant de 11ans qui est scolarisé.
texts.en: This gentleman has learned about electronics. Since 1991 after his training, he has been repairing electronic equipment at his home. Many people trust him because of the quality of his services. At this time, he has need of a few supplies for his business. So he is requesting a loan from WAGES for a third time to purchase accessories. He is 50 years old, married, and the father of an 11-year-old child who is in school.

loans.use: to purchase electronic equipment and supplies

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en: Marissa’s source of income comes from her husband's transportation business. He has been engaged in this activity for almost five years and operates from 6 am to 5 pm to supplement his usual income. Now that their tricycle is deteriorating, Marissa is seeking financial help in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy three tires, oil, and tricycle repairs. This loan is the only way of providing financial help to her husband. The couple continues to help each other in order to continuously generate income for the educational purposes of her seven children.

loans.use: to buy three tires, oil, and tricycle repairs.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, cervejas, refrescos, sumos, frangos e outros) para aumentar a diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja construir um estabelecimento comercial melhorado, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para poder pagar rapidamente o seu empréstimo e responder aos seus projectos.
texts.en:
Sergio is married and the father of 2 children who attend School, lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He is a merchant and owns his own business selling various products. With this loan he plans to buy products (oil, beer, sodas, juices, chickena dn others) to diversify and increase the quantity of his goods.

In future he hopes to build an improved commercial establishment and to this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to work even harder so that he can quickly pay off his loan and carry out his projects.

loans.use: buy products (oil, beer, sodas, juices, chickena dn others) to diversify and increase the quantity of his goods.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.pt:
Separado e pai de 2 filhos, todos frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (ração, pintos, vitaminas, e outros) para aumentar a produção de frangos. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio produzindo cogumelos em estufa e construir um estabelecimento comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento e o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
Bernardo is separated and the father of 2 children who both attend School, lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He is a trader and owns his own business rearing and selling chicken. With this loan he intends to buy products (ration, chicks, vitamins and others) to increase his production of chickens.

In future he wishes to expand his business by producing mushrooms in a green house and to build a commercial establishment. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to work even harder to obtain more income and the money to pay off his loan.

loans.use: buy products (ration, chicks, vitamins and others) to increase his production of chickens.

loans.name: Essowereou Group

texts.fr: Groupe de femmes et d’hommes, dont Kouméalo est la responsable, elle est mariée à un agriculteur et ils ont 04 enfants dont 01 seul scolarisé. Kouméalo  quant à elle est âgé de 47ans. Ils exercent comme activité la vente de mais. En ce période ou le mais abonde, ce groupement sollicite ce second crédit pour acheter et stocker de la marchandise(le mais) pour pouvoir vendre au moment de la pénurie de mais. Il est à préciser qu’elle a démarré en 1998. Elle voudrait avec les profits, scolariser son enfant, devenir une grande commerçante et pourquoi pas vendre ses produits à l’étranger. Les autres membres du groupe espèrent qu’avec le profit, assurer un bon niveau de vie à la famille.
texts.en:
This is a group of men and women, of which Kouméalo is the representative. She is married to a farmer and they have 4 children of whom only 1 goes to school. Kouméalo as for herself is 47 years old. They are in business selling corn. 

During this period when corn is abundant, this group is requesting this second loan to buy and stock up in merchandise (corn) to be able to sell corn during the time of shortages. It should be specified that she started her business in 1998. 

With the profits she would like to school her child, become a great businesswoman and why not sell products in foreign countries. The other members of the group hope that with the profits, they can ensure good living conditions for their families.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Dinis

texts.pt:
Divorciado sem filhos, vive na casa própria sozinho e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É polícia de protecção e quadro do Ministério do Interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, loiça sanitária e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa, adquirir uma viatura para facilitar o transporte, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
Dinis is divorced with no children, lives in his own house alone and doesn't support anyone else.

He is a protection policeman and a permanent employee of the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan he intends to buy construction material (cement, metal sheets, a bathroom suite and others) to continue the building work on his house.

In future he wishes to complete his house, purchase a vehicle to facilitate transport and to this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is his lack of sufficient funds to be able to complete his projects.

loans.use: buy construction material (cement, metal sheets, a bathroom suite and others) to continue the building work on his house.

loans.name: Zulfa

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de bebidas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cervejas, sumos, refrescos, vinhos, agua, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu estabelecimento para diversificar mais a sua mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para obter mais rendimento e o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
Zulfa is married and the mother of 4 children, all of age. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a businesswoman and owns her own business selling drinks. With this loan she plans to buy products (beer, juices, sodas, wine, water and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she wishes to expand her business to diversify her goods and to this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to increase her income and obtain the money required to pay off the loan.

loans.use: buy products (beer, juices, sodas, wine, water and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Olinda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (sapatos, perfumes, cremes, esmaltes, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio e para outras zonas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é inflação do metical face da moeda Sul-africana, onde adquire a sua mercadoria e o elevado custo de impostos aduaneiros.
texts.en:
Olinda is married and the mother of 4 children who all attend School, lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyones else.

She's a trader and owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to buy products (shoes, perfumes, creams, nail polish and others) to increase the quantity of her goods in stock.

In future she wishes to expand her business into other areas and to this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the Mozambican Metical's inflation in relations to South Africa's currency where she buys her goods and the high cost of customs charges.

loans.use: buy products (shoes, perfumes, creams, nail polish and others) to increase the quantity of her goods in stock.

loans.name: Acacio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para além da sua família.
Trabalha como agente de serviço numa empresa privada. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, chapas, ferro, barrotes e outros) para dar continuidade com ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para aumentar a sua renda mensal.
texts.en:
Acacio is married and the father of six children who attend school. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't provide for anyone aside from his them.

He works as a service agent in a private company. With this loan he intends to buy construction materials (sand, cement, sheets, iron, wooden beams and others) to give continuity to the expansion of his house.

In the future Acacio wishes to finish his house so he can offer more comfort to his family. For this, he is committing to paying the loan in order to request more from Hluvuku.

The challenge is to work even more in order to increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (sand, cement, sheets, iron, wooden beams and others) to give continuity to the expansion of his house.

loans.name: Nora

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos, dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa da sua mãe e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cervejas, refrescos, sumos, vinho e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja solicitar empréstimo para iniciar a construção da sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para aumentar a sua renda mensal.
texts.en:
Nora is single and the mother of 3 children, 2 of whom attend School. She lives in her mother's house and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a businesswoman and owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she plans to purchase products (beer, sodas, juices, wine and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she wishes to request a loan to begin the construction of her own house and to this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to work even more to increase her monthly income.

loans.use: purchase products (beer, sodas, juices, wine and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Sourou Group

texts.fr: Revendeuse de céréales depuis 2009, Leminatou née en 1971 est mariée à un cultivateur.  Ils ont 01 enfant de 21ans. Elle exerce seule son activité en REGION CENTRALE. Il est à préciser qu’elle est responsable du groupement nommé SOUROU constitué de femmes qui sont dans le commerce. Avec ce premier prêt qu’elles sollicitent, elles vont s’acheter des céréales, des tubercules pour revendre à la population de la région centrale. Madame Léminatou veut épargner pour les besoins futurs, assurer le bien être de la famille.
texts.en:
A retailer of grains since 2009, Ms. Leminatou was born in 1971. She is married to a farmer. They have a 21-year-old child. Ms. Leminatou operates her business by herself in REGION CENTRALE. It should be noted that she is the official of the group named SOUROU, composed of women who are in commerce. 

With this initial loan she is requesting, she is going to purchase grains and tubers to resell to people in the region. Ms. Leminatou wants to save money for future needs and to ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase grains to sell

loans.name: Melda

texts.pt:
Separada e mãe de 6 filhos, 2 dos quais frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 4 netos netas.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de bebidas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, sumos, cervejas, vinhos, e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é melhorar o seu estabelecimento e melhorar as formas de atendimento para obter mais clientes.
texts.en:
Melda is separated and the mother of 6 children, 2 of whom attend School. She lives in her own home with her family and supports another 4 grandchildren.

She is a trader and owns her own business selling drinks. With this loan she plans to buy products (sodas, juices, beers, wine and others) to increase and diversify her goods.

In future she wishes to furnish her home and  to this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to improve her establishment and improve her service to obtain more clients.

loans.use: buy products (sodas, juices, beers, wine and others) to increase and diversify her goods.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons, Fatima prefers that not to have her photo on the Internet; thus the above photo is of her husband. Fatima is a 50 year old married woman, who has 2 family members from Ashrafia in Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for home improvements. She would like to buy new furniture and wants to repaint her home. In the future, she hopes to expand her home and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Tania Margarita

texts.es: Tania tiene 30 años estado civil casada tiene 2 hijos.  Ella y su esposo se pusieron este negocio ya que no encontraban un trabajo fijo por la crisis economica del pais y la falta de empleo . tomaron la decision  ya que habían ahorrado dinero de ponerse un mini bazar  en su casa de venta de cuadernos plumas, agua. En la actualidad El negocio a ella le está resultando muy bien por lo que su sueño es surtir más su mini bazar. Su meta es comprar mas mercaderia y arreglar su casa Con el préstamo : Tania comprara, pluma, cuadernos, etc.
texts.en: Tania, 30, is married and has two children.  She and her husband set up this business because they had a hard time finding fixed work, and having saved the money they decided to install a mini bazaar in their house from which they sell pens, water, etc.   The business is going very well and her dream is to stock her mini bazaar. Her goal is to purchase more merchandise and fix up her home. With the loan she will buy pens and notebooks.

loans.use: to purchase pens and notebooks

loans.name: Fati

texts.fr: Fati vit avec son mari chauffeur et leurs deux enfants à Lomé. Elle est revendeuse de profession et vend des colas, des cigarettes, du jus et autres produits dans un marché de la place. Elle est dans ce domaine il y a 10ans et est à son troisième crédit de WAGES. Avec ce prêt, elle va s’acheter des sacs de colas, de la cigarette, des produits pharmaceutiques. Madame Fati, veut rendre pérenne son activité et assurer les besoins primaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Ms. Fati lives with her husband, a driver, and their children, in Lomé. She is a retailer by trade and sells kola nuts, cigarettes, beverages, and other products at a local market. She has been in this business for ten years and is now on her third WAGES loan. 

With this loan, she is going to purchase bags of kola nuts, some cigarettes, and pharmaceutical products. Ms. Fati wants to make her business sustainable and to ensure that the primary needs of her family are met.

loans.use: to purchase colas, cigarettes, etc. to sell

loans.name: Kalameli

texts.en: Kalameli is 42 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. Kalameli has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar and oil for her business. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Kalameli will save her profit to help her kids education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and oil

loans.name: Lorena Nancy

texts.es: Lorena comenzó con tener un negocio propio porque dice que las oportunidades en el país están escasas. Por eso Ella decidió hacer su propio negocio junto a su esposo la cual trabaja de 6:00am hasta 9:00pm le negocio le está resultando muy bien por eso quiere invertir más en su local. Con el préstamo Lorena comprara: arroz, aceite, arreglar el local , etc.
texts.en: Lorena began to have her own business because she says that the opportunities in her country are scarce. Because of this she decided to have her own business with her husband in which she works from 6am until 9pm. The business is going very well and because of this she wants to invest more in her place of business. With the loan Lorena will buy rice, oil, and fix up her place of business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, and to maintain her shop

loans.name: Kossiwavi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de friperies au marché, madame Kossiwavi, âgée de 33ans et mère d’ 01 enfant de 10ans exerce cette activité il y a 10ans. Pour pouvoir répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier  prêt pour acheter des balles de friperies. Elle veut renforcer son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de son enfant.
texts.en: A retailer of secondhand clothing at the market, Ms. Kossiwavi, aged 33, is the mother of a 10-year-old child. And she has been in this business for ten years. To be able to respond to customer needs, she is requesting an initial WAGES loan to purchase bales of used clothing. She wants to bolster her business and ensure her child thrives.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing to sell

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan tiene 39 años estado civil  casado tiene 2 hijos Juan tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su taller mecánico su historia empezó hace 20 años primero trabajo para una empresa luego con la liquidación puso su propio taller, su trabajo lo hace solo se levanta a las 6:00 y abre su taller, tiene dificultades con la delincuencia, está casado y su esposa trabaja en casa,su sueño más importante es terminar de construir su casa ya que empezó poniendo las bases y pilares. Por eso quiere el préstamo para su taller mecánico y así poder comprar soladura, pintura y grasa.etc.
texts.en: Juan, 39, is married and has two children.  Juan has great hopes for making progress in his auto repair shop in the next few years.  His story started 20 years ago when he started as an employee in a firm.  He used his severance pay to set up his own shop.  He works along.  He rises at 6am to open his shop.  He has problems with crime.  He’s married and his wife works at home.  His most important dream is to finish building his house since he’s already built the foundation and pillars.  He needs the loan for his shop so that he can buy solder, paint, grease, etc.

loans.use: to buy solder, paint, grease, etc.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Agée de 45ans, madame Ayélé est mariée à un ingénieur télécom et est mère de 03 enfants tous sur les bancs de l’école. L’ainé est âgé de 18ans et le dernier 07ans. En 2006, elle revend des pagnes, des bijoux et des produits cosmétiques qu’elle achète à Lomé dans une boutique. Elle sollicite de WAGES un troisième crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients. Avec les profits, elle veut assurer l’épanouissement de la famille et augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ayélé, age 45, is married to a telecommunication engineer. Their three children, aged 7 to 18, all attend school. 

She has been selling pagnes, jewelry and cosmetic products since 2006, and she buys her merchandise from a store in Lomé. 

She is seeking a third loan from WAGES to stock up on merchandise and better meet customer demand. She will use her profits to provide for her family’s well-being and to bolster her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy pagnes, jewelry and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Nancy Marlene

texts.es: Marlene tiene 57 años estado civil soltera tiene hijos mayores Ella empezó este negocio con poca capital gracias a los prestamos fue incrementando su capital Y pudo poner su negocio que es la la venta de comida . Tiene su local en un lugar tranquilo donde no hay mucho peligro. Trabaja todos los días. A futuro anhela tener su negocio mejor . Con el préstamo comprara ( sillas, mesas, ollas etc. )
texts.en: Marlene is 57 years old, single and has older children.  She started this business with little capital.  Thanks to loans she increased her capital and she was able to put it into her business which is selling food.  She has her business premises in a quiet place where there isn’t much danger.  She works every day.  In the future she wishes to have a better business.  With the loan she will buy chairs and tables.

loans.use: to buy chairs and tables.

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is in her forties, married and has three children going to school. She has been managing a rice farming business since she got married. Farming is the primary source of income for her family. She is happy that through her business, she is able to feed her children and provide the main necessities.

Her children are in high school and elementary level of education. She wants them to enter college so she is doing some field activities to earn more and save on labor expenses. Jonalyn works hard to provide for her rice farm inputs because her income from the business during harvesting goes primarily to household expenditures. Because of this, she is requesting a loan of P50,000 to buy farm inputs like fertilizers and herbicides for plant care. She hopes to see her children become professionals through her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides.

loans.name: Mehman

texts.en: Mehman is a 38-year-old man living in Agsu, Azerbaijan. He is married and has two school-age sons. He sells spare parts for mobile phones, and opened a shop in 2002. His goal is to expand his business, which is the only source of income for his family. Mehman has applied for a loan of 1500 AZN, which would allow him to increase his cash flow and renovate his store.

loans.use: to buy new phones and renovate his store

loans.name: Madeenah

texts.en:
For cultural reasons, Madeenah prefers not to show her photo on the Internet. The photo above is of her husband.

Madeenah is a 35-year-old married female from Ashrafia, Jordan. She has a child. Madeenah requested an 800 JOD loan to pay for her home improvement expenses and buy some furniture.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement expenses.

loans.name: Lelatou

texts.fr: Jeune femme dynamique de 26ans, Lelatou est mariée à un revendeur et ils ont ensemble un enfant de 02ans. Elle est revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2007. Pour pouvoir satisfaire les clients, elle sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un premier crédit pour acheter des produits de premières nécessités. Elle voudrait à l’avenir, avoir une grande boutique et devenir grossiste tout en assurant au coté de son mari les besoins primaires de leur enfant.
texts.en: A dynamic 26-year old woman, Lelatou is married to a vendor. They have a two-year old child. Since 2007, she has been selling general food products. In order to meet client demand, she is seeking support from WAGES in the form of her first loan intended for buying staple foods. In the future she would like to have a big store and become a wholesaler, providing alongside her husband for her child’s needs.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Diana Margarita

texts.es: En la ciudad de Manta  vive Diana, tiene 27 años y se dedica al comercio. Vive en una casa de su propiedad la cual adquirió hace 9 años y cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. La casa le sirve como bodega ya que ella vende la mercadería en un puesto fijo ubicado en el centro donde todos los días pone su negocio. Diana indica estar habituada a esta forma de trabajo ya que empezó a los 18 años pero lo hacía recorriendo diversos sectores hasta que consiguió un puesto fijo. Trabaja de lunes a domingos sin descanso. En su puesto vende pantalones unisex, camisas, pantalonetas, blusas, interiores, todo lo compra en serie al mayor y vende unitariamente. Como el puesto de Diana es informal el problema se le presenta en la época de invierno donde las lluvias enlodan las calles y las deterioran. El préstamo lo utilizara para la compra de ropa para la venta, ella espera poder reunir algo de capital para abrir un local en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Diana, 27, lives in the city of Manta; she’s a merchant.  She lives in a house that has all basic utilities she acquired nine years ago.  The house is also her warehouse since she sells the merchandise in a permanent stand downtown where she sets up her business daily.  

Diana indicates that she’s used to this way of working since she started it at the age of 18 although back then she used to sell from place to place until she was able to get her permanent stand.  She works Monday to Sunday non-stop.  She sells unisex pants, shirts, shorts, blouses, underwear.  She buys everything in series, at wholesale and sells it by the unit.  

Because Diana's stand is informal, the problem she has in the winter is the muddy, eroded streets.  She will use the loan to buy clothes to sell.  She hopes to be able to gather a bit of capital to open a locale at home.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Revendeuse de poissons et de charbons de bois à domicile, Yawa âgée de 34ans est mère de 02 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. C’est en 2000 qu’elle mène seule  cette activité et elle s’approvisionne à Lomé. Avec son second crédit de WAGES, elle va acheter des charbons de bois et des poissons pour revendre à la population. Avec le profit qu’elle fera, elle va l’investir dans l’éducation des enfants.
texts.en: A retailer of fish and charcoal at her house, Yawa is a 34-year-old mother of two children, both in school. Since 2000, she has been running this business by herself and gets her supplies in Lomé. With her second WAGES loan, she is going to purchase some charcoal and fish to resell to people. With the profits she will make, she is going to invest in her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and fish to sell

loans.name: Isabel Consuelo

texts.es: Isabel  de estado civil casada , tiene hijos mayores se dedica a la venta de comida preparada. Empezó hace 5 años y el impulso se lo brindaron su propia familia, Isabel cuenta que sucedió una mañana cuando preparando el desayuno a su familia le dijeron que hacia unas tortillas muy ricas y debería vender, con esto un día compro los ingredientes necesarios y empezó a vender frente a su domicilio tomando en cuenta que si le iba bien continuaba con él. Para su sorpresa tuvo mucha acogida y con la ayuda de su familia compro una mesa mas varios utensilios empezando el negocio. Lo atiende sola ya que es quien cocina los productos, cobrando y atendiendo a los clientes, en su venta ofrece tortillas, muchines, corviches y almuerzos los cuales puede acompañar con cola y ají casero. Con el crédito Isabel comprara una mesa, sillas y un parasol que necesita para un mejor servicio. Su sueño es abrir un restaurant en un local porque desde que inicio la venta de comida ha podido darle un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.Con el prestamo Isabel comprara: ollas, comestibles etc.
texts.en:
Isabel’s married and has adult children.  She works selling prepared food. She started five years ago encouraged by her very family.  

Isabel relates that it started one morning when as she prepared breakfast for her family they told her that she makes very delicious tortillas and should sell them.  So one day she bought the necessary ingredients and started selling in her front yard thinking that if she did well she’d continue doing it.  

Much to her surprise, she was well-received and with help from her family she bought a table and several utensils and started the business.  She tends to it alone and it’s she who cooks the meals, collects payment and tends to customers.  She sells tortillas, ‘muchines’ [cassava balls with a crunchy outside protecting a soft, savory filling], ‘corviches’ [fried green plantains filled with fish and peanuts] and lunches that can be accompanied by cola and home-made chili sauce.

Isabel will use the loan to buy a table, chairs and an umbrella that are needed to provide better service.   Her dream is to open a restaurant in a locale because since she started selling food she’s been able to provide a better lifestyle for her family.  Isabel will use the loan to buy pots, food items, etc.

loans.use: to buy pots and food ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a rickshaw body for rickshaw transport business

loans.name: Ségbognalé

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 27ans, célibataire et sans enfants, mr Ségbognalé est revendeur à Lomé.  Il exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus, la vente des cartes de recharges de façon ambulante à ses clients. Il mène cette activité depuis 2009 et s’approvisionne généralement dans les sociétés de communication. Son stock n’arrive plus à couvrir les demandes des clients, c’est pour cela il sollicite de WAGES un second prêt pour acheter de la marchandise. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, avoir un monopole sur le marché et se marier plus tard.
texts.en: A young man of 27, Mr. Ségbognalé is unmarried and without children, and he is a retailer in Lomé. He has a revenue-generating businesses selling phone minutes cards to his customers door to door. He has been in this business since 2009 and gets his supplies generally from communication companies. His inventory no longer manages to meet the demands of his customers. This is why he is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase supplies. He wants to reinvest in his business, have a monopoly in the market, and to get married later on.

loans.use: to purchase phone minutes cards to sell

loans.name: Nassar

texts.en:
Nassar is from Iraq. He is a youth client, aged 24 years, single, and lives with a family of four members, two of who are employed.
Nassar is a cowman and has a small farm. He has acquired this profession by working with his father for several years. In 2000, he established his own small farm. He has good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.
He is requesting a $2,100 youth loan to buy a cow. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Aboudala

texts.fr: Détenteur d’un bar depuis 2008, mr Aboudala est marié à une revendeuse, ils ont 04 enfants dont 03 sur les bancs d’école. Pour acheter des boissons et de la nourriture pour son cafétariat, il sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour en acheter. Avec les profits, il veut renforcer son activité et assurer l’auto suffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en: A bar owner since 2008, Mr. Aboudala is married to a retailer. They have four children, of whom three are in school. To purchase beverages and food supplies for his cafeteria, he is requesting a second loan from WAGES. With the profits, he wants to bolster his business and ensure that his family is self-sufficient in terms of food.

loans.use: to purchase beverages and food supplies for his pub

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is a youth client, age 30 years old, married, but still doesn’t have any children. Ali owns a shop for repairing appliances. He established his business in 2000. He has good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

Ali is requesting a $3000 youth loan to pay the annual rent for his shop and buy a machine specialized for his work. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his shop and buy a machine specialized for his work.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Kokou vit avec sa femme revendeuse et leurs 02 enfants à Lomé. L’ainé de 06 ans seul va à l'école. Le dernier est âgé de 03ans. En 2011, il a ouvert son propre cafetariat dans lequel il sert de la nourriture à ses clients. N’arrivant plus à satisfaire les besoins de ses derniers, il sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour acheter des marchandises (lait, spaguetti, sucre…). Comme perspectives d’avenir, il voudrait agrandir son activité et aider les enfants dans leurs éducations.
texts.en: Kokou lives with his wife, a retailer, and their two children in Lomé. The oldest child is 6 years old and the only one going to school. The youngest child is 3. In 2011, Kokou opened his own cafeteria, in which he serves food to his customers. No longer able to satisfy the needs of his customers, he is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase goods (milk, spaghetti, sugar,…) For the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies for his cafeteria

loans.name: Dúo Chuasij Group

texts.es:
Dúo Chuasij, Doña Felisa  de 52 años de edad tiene 3 hijos a su cargo ella es originaria de San Juan Comalapa 
Ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano, tiene ya varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad ya que es la única forma de poder ayudar a su familia para que juntos con ella salgan adelante, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano, ella espera que kiva como a mucha gente le ha ayudado para salir adelante le puedan ayudar a ella también por medio le crédito solicitando.
texts.en: Dúo Chuasij’s, Doña Felisa is 52 years old mother of three dependent children; she was born in San Juan Comalapa and makes a living selling traditional hand woven products; she has been doing this kind of work for a few years already because it is the only way in which she can help her family to get ahead.  She is requesting this loan to purchase supplies to make traditional hand woven products and hopes that KIVA can help her succeed the same way it has helped many others in the past, by funding the loan she has requested.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make traditional hand woven products.

loans.name: Paulin

texts.fr: Marié à une revendeuse de pagnes, mr paulin est père de 02 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. L’ainé a 15ans et le dernier 10ans. Il est détenteur d’un cafétariat depuis 2008. Afin de faire le ravitaillement des produits alimentaires pour son cafetariat, il sollicite de WAGES un troisième crédit. Avec les profits, il va réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en: Married to a retailer of 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), Mr. Paulin is a father of two children, both in school. The oldest is 15 years old, and the youngest is 10. Mr. Paulin has owned a cafeteria since 2008. To restock with food supplies for his cafeteria, he is requesting a third WAGES loan. With the profits, he is going to reinvest in his business and ensure that his family's critical needs are met.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his cafeteria

loans.name: Dúo San Antonio Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN ANTONIO
El grupo está integrado por la señora Delia quien tiene 33 años de edad se dedica  a la crianza de cerdos y pollos desde hace 10 años  ella inicio con la ayuda de su mama, ella necesita otro crédito para la compra de cerdos  y concentrado  para poder   engordarlos para las fechas navideñas su deseo es seguir creciendo  en la compra de cerdos y poder  sacar adelante a su hija ya que es madre soltera espera que kiva le pueda dar ese apoyo que ella nececita para salir adelante.
texts.en: Delia, a 33 year old who earns her living by raising pigs and chickens is part of the DUO SAN ANTONIO group. She started ten years ago with the help of her mom. She needs another loan so she can buy pigs and feed in order to fatten them up by the Christmas season. Her wish is to keep growing her pig buying business and to help her daughter, a single mother, get ahead in life. She hopes Kiva can give her the support she needs to be successful.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Dúo Kairos 1 Group

texts.es: Dúo Kairos 1. Este dúo está integrado por la señora Marta otilia es casada y tiene 10 hijos ella es originaria de San Juan Comalapa,ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejido tipicos(güipiles y fajas) sus ventas las realizan de forma ambulante ya que por momento el capital que tiene es muy poco entonces necesitan tener mas capital para agrandar más su negocio y optar por un local, ella esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de tejidos tipicos a mano,espera que le puedan ayudar con el crédito solicitado.
texts.en:
This duo includes Marta Otilia, who is married and has 10 children. She is a native of San Juan Comalapa, and makes a living by weaving traditional textiles (tunics and sashes). 

Their sales are made in an inconsistent manner because at the moment they have little capital. They need more capital to further grow their business and choose a location. 

She requests this loan to purchase raw materials for weaving traditional handmade textiles. She hopes that the requested loan can help her.

loans.use: to purchase the raw material for weaving hand-made textiles

loans.name: Kokoè

texts.fr: Revendeuse de riz à la devanture de la maison, Kokoè âgée de 32ans est mariée et mère de 02 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. Pour renforcer son activité de vente de riz, elle fait appel à WAGES pour un crédit. Avec ce montant, elle va acheter des aliments (tomate, riz, huile végétale) entrants dans la préparation du riz. Elle voudrait agrandir son activité  et avoir un restaurant plus tard. Madame voudrait voir ses enfants s’épanouir.
texts.en: Selling rice in front of her house, Kokoè is a 32-year-old married mother of two children, who are both in school. To bolster her business selling rice, she has inquired with WAGES for a loan. With this sum, she is going to purchase some supplies (tomatoes, rice, vegetable oil) for making rice. Kokoè would like to expand her business and have a restaurant later on. She would like to see her children thrive.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies for her food stand

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Restauratrice de profession, Ama est spécialisée dans la préparation de riz qu’elle commercialise à un point de vente situé devant sa maison. Elle est âgée de 44 ans et pratique cette activité depuis 2002. Elle  vit avec son mari maçon et leurs trois enfants dont  01 non scolarisé, qui sont respectivement âgés de 22, 12 et 08 ans. Elle sollicite un second prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter les condiments tel que le riz, l’huile végétale et les pâtes alimentaires. Elle ambitionne d’agrandir son activité et d’avoir une famille bien éduquée grâce aux profits supplémentaires.
texts.en:
A restauranteur by trade, Ama is specialized in making rice dishes that she sells at an outlet in front of her house. She is 44 years old and has been in this business since 2002. She lives with her husband, a mason, and their three children, who are 22, 12, and 8 years old, respectively. One of the children is not in school. 

Ama is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase condiments, such as rice, vegetable oil, and pasta. Her ambition is to expand her business and to have a well-educated family, thanks to the additional profits.

loans.use: to purchase rice, vegetable oil, spaghetti... for her food stand.

loans.name: Wisam

texts.en:
Wisam is from Iraq. He is a youth client, age 28, married and has two children. He is the only provider for the family. Wisam owns a women's clothing shop. He specializes in selling and renting wedding and evening dresses. He has been in this business since 2011. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

Wisam is requesting a $1,800 loan to pay the annual rent for his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his shop

loans.name: Ovowareborie

texts.fr: Née en 1978, mariée à un journaliste et mère de 03enfants dont 02 sur les bancs d’école, Ovawareborie exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente de la friperie. Elle vend des draps, des torchons, des serviettes à ses clients de façon ambulante et s’approvisionne au marché de HEDZRANAWOE (ce marché réputé dans la vente des objets de friperie). Étant une ancienne cliente de WAGES, elle sollicite son troisième crédit chez nous pour s’approvisionner en marchandise.(Draps, torchons, serviettes et autres) . Comme perspectives d’avenir, madame veut rendre pérenne son activité, en la diversifiant par la vente d’autres produits de friperie et aider son conjoint dans les charges du foyer.
texts.en:
Ovawareborie was born in 1978; she is married to a journalist and the mother of three children, two of whom go to school. Her income-generating activity is the retail of second-hand fiber goods. She sells bed sheets, kitchen towels, and towels. She sells to her clients by going door-to-door, and gets her supplies from the market of Hedzranawoe (this market is famed for its sales of second-hand fiber goods).

A long-standing client of WAGES, she is requesting her third loan with us to stock up on merchandise (bed sheets, kitchen and bathroom towels, etc.) In the future, she wants to make her business sustainable by diversifying her sales to include other second-hand fiber goods, and she wants to support her husband in paying for the household’s expenses.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand fiber goods.

loans.name: Komi-Kuma

texts.fr: Jeune homme dynamique de 26ans, Komi-Kuma est revendeur d’huile à moteur à domicile. Il exerce seul l’activité et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Confronté au manque de stock de marchandises, il sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour en acheter. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité et se marier plus tard.
texts.en: A young energetic man, Komi-Kuma is a retailer of motor oil out of his home. He operates this business by himself and gets his supplies in Lomé. Confronted with a lack of inventory, he is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase some. He wants to reinvest in his business and get married later on.

loans.use: to purchase motor oil

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en: Daisy is 62 years old and married with 6 children. She makes and sells elei printing materials to earn a living and has been doing this for many years. Daisy has requested a loan to buy paints, brushes, materials, elei designs, etc. She plans to use her profits to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paints, brushes, materials, elei designs, etc.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi  âgée de 33ans, n’a pas d’enfants en charge. Elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente des pagnes, des casseroles, des sceaux et divers. Cette activité qu’elle a commencé il y a 07ans de façon ambulante lui procure des revenus considérables  lui permettant de se prendre en charge. Pour pouvoir garder ses clients car confrontée au problème de concurrence sur le terrain, elle sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un quatrième crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Son désir est de tout faire pour satisfaire ses clients, tailler une place de choix sur le marché et avoir une grande boutique.
texts.en:
Ablavi, 33 years old, has no children to support. She has a revenue-generating business selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), pots and pans, buckets, and a variety of other goods. This business, which she started by going door to door seven years ago, enables her to support herself. 

To keep her customers, since she is confronted with the problem of competition on the ground, she is requesting help from WAGES with a fourth loan, so as to stock up on merchandise. Her desire is to do her best to satisfy her customers, carve out a choice location at the market, and own a large store.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth, pots and pans, and basins to sell

loans.name: Essoham

texts.fr: Mr Essoham est âgé de 30ans. Sa femme est couturière et ils ont 01 enfant en charge. Pour bien jouer son rôle de père de famille, il vend au marché des portables et ses accessoires. Il s’approvisionne généralement chez les grossistes qui viennent de la Chine. Ces derniers ont apporté de nouvelles marques mais manquant de fonds, il sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour en acheter. Avec les profits, il veut s’occuper de la famille tout en rendant pérenne son activité.
texts.en:
Mr Essoham is 30 years old. His wife is a seamstress and they have one dependent child. To fulfill his role as a father, he sells cell phones and accessories at the market. 

He buys his supplies from Chinese wholesalers who bring in new brands of phones. In order to buy more phones, he's asking for a second loan from WAGES. With the profits, he will take care of his family while making his business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy cell phones and accessories.

loans.name: Akossiwoa

texts.fr: Couturière de profession, madame Akossiwoa âgée de 45ans est mariée à un maintenancier, ils ont 02 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. Après sa formation, elle a ouvert un atelier mais exerce dans lequel elle coud des habits qu'elle revend dans un marché de la place. Pour l’achat de ses tissus, elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour en acheter. Comme perspectives d’avenir, elle veut assurer le bien être de la famille et agrandir son commerce.
texts.en: A clothier by trade, Ms. Akossiwoa, 45 years old, is married to a maintenance technician. They have two children, both in school. Following her training, she opened a workshop where she operates and sews clothing, which she resells at a local market. To purchase her fabrics, she is requesting a second WAGES loan. For the future, she wants to ensure her family's well-being and to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth for making clothing

loans.name: Susi Marisol

texts.es: La señora Susi es una mujer de 34 años  y que no vive con su esposo, tiene 4 hijos que a los mismos desde hace mucho tiempo va cuidando sola con su esfuerzo haciendo estudiar a todos sin perjudicar, actualmente la cliente se dedica ala elaboración de canastillos de alambre y que sostiene a la familia entera con ese empeño, la solicitante no tiene casa propia, vive en alquiler y a pesar de las obligaciones que tiene sigue luchando por sus hijos, ella decidió optar por crédito y que ahora se demostró su realidad y le servirá para ampliar mas actividad y mas aun que ahora se acerca la feria de alasitas y para ello requiere el crédito. 2 años atrás su hijo menor tuvo una enfermedad casi de 6 meses que el cual no le dejo ser prospera en su trabajo que sufrió bastante en hacer curar a su hijo y que actualmente ya se sano el niño. La solicitante tiene muchas ganas e ideas para seguir triunfando la vida, y ser ejemplo de la familia y de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Sra. Susi is a 34-year-old woman who does not live with her husband. She has four children and spends a great deal of time taking care of them alone. With great effort, she is able to provide an education for all of them. At the moment, Bertha earns her living by making baskets out of wire. Through her efforts, she is able to support her entire family. Susi does not own a home and lives in a rental property. Despite her obligations, she continues to strive to support her children.

Susi decided to apply for a loan and now it has become a reality. She will be able to expand her business activity just in time for the upcoming fair. Two years ago, her youngest child came down with an illness that lasted almost six months. During this time, she was not able to be productive and her work suffered while her child was in recovery. Today her child is healthy.

Susi has many ideas and the drive to continue being successful in life. She is a role model for her family and the rest of society.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making metal baskets.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de esta mujer de sesenta y cinco años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas desde hace quince años, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda obtener muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad de , por los precios accesibles y por el excelente servicio, siempre a la orden de los clientes; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos ideales y alejada de la delincuencia de su area, para ella lo mas importante es la familia y su seguridad por eso hoy que su vivienda ha tenido algunos desperfectos quiere aprovechar y realizar una inversión para su reparación pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un credito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillos, piso, herramientas, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to get ahead is one of the most important dreams of this sixty five year old woman who lives with her family. She has made and sold tortillas for fifteen years. She has a lot of experience in sales and this helps her earn a good income. She has gained a lot of customers because people prefer her because of the quality, excellent service and accesible prices. She is always ready to serve her customers and is an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work. Every day she fights for a better future with new ideals and free from the crime of her neighborhood. For her the most important thing is family and her safety. That is why she wants to make an investment and repair some problems her house has. She doesn't have enough capital and that is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy cement, bricks, flooring, tools etc. She has good credit references and is very responsible. She is committed to paying off her loan and has faith she can bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, flooring and tools.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr: Boulangère depuis 2002, Kossiwa est une veuve âgée de 44 ans ayant 04 enfants en charge. Ces derniers sont tous scolarisé à l’exception d’un seul. Elle pratique cette activité à son lieu de résidence où se trouve son four traditionnel. Face aux besoins sans cesse croissant, elle désire acheter une quantité plus importante de farine de blé et sollicite pour cela, son tout premier crédit auprès de WAGES. Elle espère tirer autant que peut se faire des bénéfices considérables pour assurer la pérennité de son activité et avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
A baker since 2002, Kossiwa is a 44-year-old widow with 4 dependent children. All of the children but one go to school.

Kossiwa bakes at home where she has a traditional oven. Faced with ever-increasing demand, she wishes to buy a larger amount of wheat flour and is therefore requesting her first loan from WAGES. She hopes to make the largest possible profits in order to ensure the continued existence of her business and have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour with which to make bread.

loans.name: Rassiratou

texts.fr: Née en 1986, Rassiratou vit avec son conjoint revendeur et leur seul enfant de 1an à Lomé.  Pour prêter main forte à son conjoint dans les charges du foyer, elle vend depuis 2008 des produits alimentaires dans un marché de la ville de Lomé. N’arrivant plus à répondre aux besoins des clients à cause de manque de stock, elle sollicite un quatrième crédit de WAGES. Montant qu’elle prendra pour acheter des produits d’alimentation générale (riz, huile végétale, sucre, tomate en boite, lait etc) afin de garder ses clients car elle est confrontée aux problèmes de concurrence sur le terrain. Elle veut varier son activité et assurer le bien être de la famille.
texts.en:
Born in 1986, Rassiratou lives in Lomé with her husband, a retailer, and their only child, a 1-year-old. To help out her husband to cover household expenses, Rassiratou has been selling groceries at a market in Lomé since 2008. 

No longer managing to meet the needs of her customers because of a lack of inventory, she is requesting a fourth loan from WAGES. She will use these funds to purchase grocery items (rice, vegetable oil, sugar, canned tomatoes, milk, etc.) to keep her customers, since she is confronted with the problem of competition on the ground. She wants to vary her business and ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items to sell

loans.name: Ankouvi

texts.fr: Père d’une famille de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés, Akouvi âgé de 27 ans est soudeur- ferrailleur de profession et pratique aussi la revente des matériaux de construction dans une boutique de la place depuis 2002. Son premier enfant est âgé de 7 ans et son dernier est âgé de  02 ans. Il sollicite son tout premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour renforcer son stock de matériaux de construction. Il compte réinvestir les profits dans l’activité commerciale afin de l'agrandir et d’avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Akouvi is 27 years old and father of three children, two of whom have received schooling. Akouvi is a welder/scrap metal merchant by profession, and he has also been selling construction supplies in a shop downtown since 2002. His eldest child is seven years old, and his youngest child is two years old.

He is seeking his first loan from WAGES, to reinforce his stock of construction supplies. He plans to reinvest the profits in his business in order to help it grow, and he wants his family to be happy.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Dogbovi

texts.fr: Mère d’un enfant de 04ans, qui est scolarisé, madame Dogbovi a pour époux chef magasinier. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle revend des mèches dans une boutique. Elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour acheter des produits pour revendre à la population. A l’avenir, elle veut augmenter son stock de marchandises et s’occuper de la famille. Elle est âgée de 30ans et est dans ce domaine il y a 06ans.
texts.en: The mother of a 4-year-old child, who is in school, Ms. Dogbovi has a husband who is the head of a store. To help out her husband to cover household expenses, she sells hair extensions retail in a shop. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase some products to resell to people. For the future, she wants to increase her stock of merchandise and to take care of her family. She is 30 years old and has been in this business for six years.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions to sell in her shop

loans.name: Kamilo

texts.fr: Mariée à un technicien bâtiment, Kamilo âgée de 30ans est mère d’un enfant de 06 mois. En 2006, elle a démarré son activité de vente de pagnes, de cartes de recharge et des produits d’alimentation générale à domicile. Elle est par moment confrontée aux problèmes de concurrence sur le terrain et pour pallier à ce problème, elle fait un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises qu’elle va revendre à ses clients. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer le bien – être de la famille.
texts.en:
Married to a building technician, Kamilo is 30 years old and the mother of a 6-month-old child.  

In 2006, she started to sell "pagnes" (traditional West-African fabrics), telephone recharge cards and food products, from her home.  

To overcome the difficulties associated with local competition, Kamilo has applied for a second loan from WAGES.  This loan will be used to buy products that she will resell to her customers.  

Kamilo wants to reinvest in her business and ensure the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes", telephone recharge cards, and general food products.

loans.name: Lomalo

texts.fr: Femme dynamique de 42ans, Lomalo mariée exerce depuis 2002  l’activité de la vente des produits d’alimentation générale au marché. Elle voudrait renforcer son activité c’est pour cela elle sollicite son quatrième crédit à WAGES (Il est à préciser que les trois premiers crédits sont remboursés sans aucun problème). Avec les profits, elle veut stocker plus de marchandises, ouvrir une boutique et assurer l’auto suffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en: A dynamic, 42-year-old, married woman, Lomalo has been selling grocery products at the market since 2002. She would like to strengthen her business and is therefore requesting her 4th loan from WAGES. Her first 3 loans were repaid without difficulty. She wants to use her profits to increase her inventory of products, open a shop and ensure her family's food self-sufficiency.

loans.use: to buy grocery products.

loans.name: Ahenim

texts.fr: Ahenim vit avec son mari informaticien et leur seul enfant de 06ans qui va à l’école à Lomé. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du ménage, elle a décidé de vendre en 2004 des habits. Afin de renforcer son stock de marchandises, elle sollicite un troisième crédit à WAGES pour en acheter. Comme perspectives d’avenir, elle voudrait ouvrir une boutique car pour le moment, son activité se déroule de façon ambulante. Elle est âgée de 33ans et veut voir son enfant s’épanouir.
texts.en: Ahenim lives with her computer specialist husband and their only child, who is 6 years old and goes to school in Lomé. In order to be able to help her husband with the household expenses, she decided to start selling clothes in 2004. She is requesting a 3rd loan from WAGES in order to buy clothing and strengthen her inventory of merchandise. Her future plans include opening a shop as, currently, she sells on the street. She is 33 years old and would like to see her child flourish.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Gbloènémawu

texts.fr: Malgré son âge avancé, gbloénémawu se bat chaque fois  pour avoir son pain quotidien. Âgée de 50ans, elle a pour mari un mécanicien et a un enfant de 35ans. C’est au bord de la route qu’elle exerce son activité de vente d’ustensiles de cuisine. Confrontée par moment au problème de concurrence sur le terrain, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour renforcer son activité. Son souhait est d’avoir une boutique de vente d’ustensiles de cuisine et d’assurer le bien être de la famille.
texts.en: Despite her advanced age, Gbloénémawu struggles continuously to obtain her daily bread. She is 50 years old and has a husband who is a mechanic. She has a 35-year-old child. The roadside is where she operates her business selling kitchen utensils. Confronted at times by the problem of competition on the ground, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to bolster her business. She wishes to have a store selling kitchen utensils and to ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr: Mr Komlan âgé de 35ans vit avec sa femme et leur enfant de 03mois à Lomé. Il a appris l’informatique et après sa formation, il a ouvert un cyber. Pour investir plus dans son activité, il sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des outils informatiques. Il veut étendre son activité en créant d’autres points et assurer une meilleure condition de vie à la famille.
texts.en: Mr. Komlan, 35 years old, lives with his wife and their 3-month-old child in Lomé. He learned computer programming, and after his training, he opened an internet cafe. To invest in his business more, he is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase some computer tools. He wants to expand his business by creating other locations and to ensure better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase computer supplies and equipment

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.fr: Mr Kodjo marié est père d’un enfant. Il est revendeur de chaussures et des produits cosmétiques à domicile et de façon ambulante. Pour renforcer son activité de chaussures, il sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il veut réinvestir dans le commerce et prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Kodjo is a married father of one child. He is a retailer of shoes and cosmetics at his house and door to door. To bolster his shoe business, he is requesting an initial loan from WAGES. For the future, he want to reinvest in his business and to take care of his family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Afin de s’approvisionner en quantité considérable de téléphones  portables, madame yawa sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour atteindre son objectif. Elle voudrait ouvrir une boutique dans laquelle elle exposera ses marchandises et prendre soin de sa famille. Yawa âgée de 44ans est mariée à un revendeur et ils ont un enfant de 12ans qui va à l’école. Elle exerce son activité au marché et est dans ce domaine il y a 02ans.
texts.en: Yawa is requesting her 1st loan from WAGES in order to reach her goal of buying a large quantity of mobile phones. She would like to open in shop in which to display her merchandise, and to take care of her family. Yawa is 44 years old and married to a reseller. The couple have a 12-year-old child who goes to school. Yawa makes her sales at the market and has been in this business for 2 years.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones.

loans.name: Kossivi

texts.fr: Mr Kossivi âgé de 25ans est père d’un enfant de 07mois.  Il a pour épouse une commerçante. Il a loué une boutique dans laquelle il vend  des ciments depuis 2009. Ses clients sont plus des maçons, des entrepreneurs. N’arrivant plus à satisfaire ses derniers, il fait appel à WAGES par un crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Avec les profits, il voudrait épargner pour terminer son chantier, avoir un autre magasin tout en prenant soin de sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Kossivi, 25 years old, is a father with one child, who is 7 months old. He is married to a merchant. He leases a shop in which he has been selling cement since 2009. His customers are masons and entrepreneurs. No longer able to satisfy his customers, he is calling upon  WAGES for a loan to stock up on merchandise. With the profits, he would like to save more money, so as to finish his construction work, and to obtain another store while taking care of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Mère de 03 enfants, madame Amélé est mariée à un herboriste.  Elle revend à domicile des charbons de bois et des boissons alcoolisées   qu’elle achète dans les marchés de Lomé. Pour renforcer son commerce, elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des charbons de bois et de la boisson. Elle voudrait améliorer son commerce et avoir une meilleure condition de vie.
texts.en: The mother of three children, Ms. Amélé is married to a herbalist. She sells charcoal retail at her house, as well as alcoholic beverages that she buys at the markets of Lomé. To bolster her business, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase charcoal and drinks to sell. She would like to improve her business and to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and beverages to sell

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi âgée de 28ans est revendeuse de friperies dans un marché de la place. Elle exerce seule cette activité génératrice de revenus depuis 2000 et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Pour le renforcement de son activité, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour acheter   des balles de friperies. Comme perspectives d ‘avenir, elle veut ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter et assurer l’auto suffisance alimentaire de la famille. Notons qu’elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants âgés de 05 et 02ans. Le plus âgé est scolarisé.
texts.en: Ablavi, 28 years old, is a retailer of secondhand clothing at a local market. She has been operating this revenue-generating business by herself since 2000, and she gets her supplies from Lomé. To bolster her business, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase bales of secondhand clothing. For the future, she wants to open a ready-to-wear clothing store and to ensure her family's self-sufficiency in terms of food. To note, she is a married mother of two children, aged 5 and 2 years old. The oldest is in school.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing to sell

loans.name: Eguizani

texts.fr: Démarré en 2009, madame Eguizani vend des friperies à domicile. Elle est en manque de fonds pour s’approvisionner en marchandises c’est pour cela qu’elle sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un premier crédit pour renforcer son activité. Avec les profits elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille. Notons qu’elle est âgée de 33ans,a pour mari un gérant d’une institution financière et n’a pas d’enfants en charge pour le moment.
texts.en: Starting in 2009, Ms. Eguizani has been selling secondhand clothing at her house. She lacks the funds for restocking her inventory. This is why she is requesting help from WAGES with an initial loan, so as to bolster her business. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business and to ensure her family thrives. To note, she is 33 years old, and her husband is a supervisor at a large financial institution. She has no children to support for now.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing to sell

loans.name: Améyo

texts.fr: Améyo âgée de 44ans vit avec son mari revendeur et leur enfant de 08ans à Lomé. Consciente de la cherté de la vie, elle ne voulait pas voir son mari seul prendre soin de la famille c’est pour cela elle a jugé bon de vendre des produits cosmétiques (mèches, poudre pour le visage, des déodorants et autres produits). Cette activité se fait depuis 2009 dans un marché de la place et cela lui procure des revenus considérables lui permettant de prêter main forte à son conjoint. Elle sollicite une seconde fois un crédit à WAGES pour acheter plus de marchandises (produits cosmétiques) afin de mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients. A l’avenir, elle voudrait devenir grossiste et aider son mari dans l’éducation de leur enfant.
texts.en: Améyo, 44 years old, lives with her husband, who is a retailer, and their eight-year-old child in Lome. Conscious of the high cost of living, she didn't want to see her husband take care of the family alone, and it is for that that she considered it a good a idea to sell cosmetic products (hair extensions, facial products, deodorants and other products). She has worked in this business since 2009 in a market in the area and this brings her considerable revenues, which allow her to lend a strong hand to her husband. She is asking for a loan from WAGES for the second time to buy more merchandise (cosmetic products) in order to better respond to her customers' needs. In the future, she would like to become a wholesaler and help her husband with her child's education.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and cosmetics.

loans.name: Vodouvi

texts.fr: Démarré son activité en 2010, madame vodouvi âgée de 32ans est mariée à un revendeur. Elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente des motos et des pièces détachées. Activité dans laquelle, trois personnes lui prêtent main forte. Ces temps ci, les demandes viennent de parts et d’autres et n’arrivant plus à les satisfaire à cause du manque de marchandises, elle sollicite auprès de WAGES un premier crédit pour acheter des pièces détachées. Comme perspectives d’avenir, elle veut stocker plus de marchandises pour le renforcement de son activité et assurer un avenir meilleur à la famille.
texts.en:
Having started her business in 2010, Ms. Vodouvi, 32 years old, is married to a retailer. She has a revenue-generating business selling motorbikes and spare parts. This is a business where three persons help her out a lot. 

These days, orders come from all over. No longer managing to satisfy her customers due to a lack of goods, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES, so as to purchase some spare parts. For the future, she wants to stock up on more merchandise to bolster her business and to ensure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts to sell

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Former  en métier de coiffure,  Adjo exerce depuis 03 ans dans son atelier. Âgée de 34 ans, elle est mariée et mère d’un seul enfant de 02 ans. Elle associe également le commerce pour lequel elle sollicite son troisième prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter les mèches et les  produits de beauté. Elle souhaite agrandir son activité et assurer la sécurité alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en: Trained in the  trade of hairstyling, Adjo has been in business in her salon for three years. She is 34 years old, married and a mother of a 2-year-old child. She includes commerce with her business for which she is requesting a third loan from WAGES to purchase hair extensions and beauty products. She would like to expand her business and ensure her family's food security.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions and beauty products to sell

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Couturière de profession, Akossiwa vit avec son conjoint déclarant en douanes et leurs 02 enfants de 13 et 1an à Lomé. L’ainé seul est scolarisé. Après sa formation, elle a ouvert son atelier dans lequel elle exerce seule son activité. Elle manque de machines de plinthe c’est pour cela, elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour en acheter. Avec les profits, madame Akossiwa voudrait investir dans la construction de sa maison, avoir un atelier plus grand et assurer l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: A clothier by trade, Akossiwa lives in Lomé with her husband, a customs inspector, and their two children, aged 13 and 1 years old. The oldest is in school. After her training, Akossiwa opened her workshop in which she operates her business by herself. She lacks baseboard sewing machines. This is why she is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase some. With the profits, Ms. Akossiwa would like to invest in the construction of her house, have a large workshop, and ensure her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Couturière de formation, Kayi a associé aussi le commerce de bijoux et pagnes dans son atelier. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants  tous scolarisés. Le premier de ses enfants a 23 ans tandis que le dernier en a 12. Elle sollicite son premier crédit auprès de WAGES pour acquérir une quantité plus importante de bijoux et pagnes afin d’agrandir son commerce. Elle compte former ses enfants dans le domaine du commerce et espère ouvrir une grande boutique plus tard.
texts.en:
A seamstress by training, Kayi also sells jewelry and pagnes (traditional wrap arounds) in her studio. She is married and is the mother of 3 children - all of whom go to school. Her eldest child is 23 and her youngest child is 12. 

She is asking for her first loan with WAGES to buy more jewelry and pagnes in order to grow her business. Later on, she would like to educate her children in business and open a large boutique.

loans.use: to buy pagnes (traditional wrap arounds) and jewelry.

loans.name: Massan

texts.fr: Revendeuse de condiments et divers au marché, Massan est âgée de 49ans. Elle est mariée et mère d’un enfant. C’est en 1990, qu’elle exerce cette activité et elle s’y plait bien car cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant de se prendre en charge. Elle sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des condiments et des produits divers. Elle voudrait avec le profit, acheter une moto pour faire du taxi - moto, avoir une autre boutique en dehors du marché et assurer le bien – être de la famille.
texts.en: A seller of condiments and other goods at a market, Massan is 49 years old, married, and the mother of one child. Since 1990, she has been running this business she is very happy with, since it brings in the revenues enabling her to support herself. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to purchase condiments and a variety of goods. She would like to use the profits to purchase a motorbike serving as a moto-taxi, obtain another shop outside the market, and ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase condiments and other items to sell

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.es: Clemencia, de 46 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo Anasto y de sus hijos, Sulma y Keny, a los que cuida en la casa que compró hace 5 años.
