A más de una hora de viaje, se ubican los terrenos propios de Clemencia, donde hace más de 25 años los dedica a la agricultura, sus principales sembríos constan de papa, maíz y demás tubérculos. Gusta mucho de su trabajo, ya que nació cuidando la tierra y viéndola crecer. Paralelo a su actividad, se dedica a la crianza de animales como ovejas y vacas, por lo que también obtiene un dinero extra con la elaboración de queso y la venta de carne. Dentro de muy poco comenzará la cosecha de papa, espera poder tener mucho éxito, sobre todo por que sembró de manera orgánica y los frutos son de muy buena calidad. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente segura y estable en su negocio, pues recibe el apoyo económico de su asociación, por eso promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Clemencia, invertirá el dinero en la compra de 50 sacos de abono orgánicos para seguir con la siembra de sus alimentos.
texts.en:
Clemencia, 46, is an unassuming woman living with her husband, Anasto, and their children, Sulma and Keny,  who she cares for in the house she bought five years ago.  

Clemencia’s farmland is located over an hour away.  She’s been working in agriculture for more than 25 years.  Her main crops are potatoes, corn and other tubers.  She enjoys her work very much since she was born caring for the land and it watched her grow up.  Alongside this activity, she also raises animals like sheep and cows earning extra money from making and selling cheese and selling meat.  

She will begin to harvest potatoes shortly and hopes to be very successful above all because she planted organically and the fruit is of very high quality.

This is her fourth MFP loan.  Thanks to it she feels secure and stable in her business because she gets financial support from her association which is why she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Clemencia will use the money to buy 50 sacks of organic manure to continue growing food.

loans.use: to buy fifty sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Yawa est une jeune femme mariée à un militaire âgée de 33 ans. Elle pratique la vente de produits d’alimentation générale à domicile comme à la boutique et se fait aider par une personne. Ses 02 enfants âgés  respectivement de 15 et 05 ans sont tous scolarisés. Elle sollicite son premier prêt auprès  de WAGES  pour l’achat des produits d’alimentation générale afin de diversifier sa marchandise et d’agrandir son activité. Elle compte ainsi pouvoir assurer les besoins en alimentation et en santé de sa famille.
texts.en: Yawa is a young woman who is married to a 33 year old man who is in the military. She sells general food items from her home and from a boutique. She has one person to help. Her two children, ages 15 and 5, are both in school. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES for the purchase of general food products in order to diversify her products and expand her activity. This way, she will be able to provide for her family's food and health needs.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Ayawa

texts.fr: Revendeuse de nourriture au bord de la route, Ayawa mariée à un chauffeur est mère d’01 enfant de 11ans. Elle est aidée par 01 personne dans l’exécution de son activité. Elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des aliments entrant dans la préparation de la nourriture. Avec les profits supplémentaires, elle veut stocker des produits alimentaires, rendre pérenne son activité et avoir avec sa famille une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: A food seller along the roadside, Ayawa is married to a driver and is the mother of an 11-year-old child. One persons helps her to carry out her work. Ayawa is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to purchase some supplies for cooking food to sell. With the additional profits, she wants to stock up on grocery items, make her business sustainable, and have good living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her food stall

loans.name: Ikonio

texts.fr: Âgée de 21 ans, Ikonio est une jeune femme mariée de 21 ans qui pratique la revente des oignons et d’épices. Elle a débuté cette activité depuis 2010 et dispose d’un point de vente au marché. Nécessitant des fonds pour le renforcement de son stock, elle sollicite son premier prêt auprès de WAGES pour  payer des oignons et épices. Ses  objectifs sont l’agrandissement de son activité et l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Ikonio, age 21, is a young woman who buys and resells onions and spices. She has been doing this since 2010 and has a stall in the market. Needing funds to increase her stock, she is requesting her first loan from WAGES to buy onions and spices. Her goals are to expand her business and to have a thriving family.

loans.use: to buy onions and spices.

loans.name: Innocente

texts.fr: Innocente est une jeune dame de 31ans. Elle a épousé un soudeur et ils ont 04enfants dont 03 scolarisés. Devant son domicile, elle revend des biscuits et torchons à toutes personnes dans le besoin. Avec son second crédit qu’elle sollicite à WAGES, elle va s’approvisionner en marchandises (biscuits et torchons) pour pouvoir répondre aux besoins de ses clients.  Elle veut rendre son activité pérenne et avoir une bonne condition de vie.
texts.en: Innocente is a young woman, 31 years old. She is married to a welder, and they have four children, including three in school. In front of her home, she sells cookies and cloth to anyone in need of them. With her second loan she is requesting from WAGES, she is going to stock up on merchandise (cookies and cloth) to be able to respond to the needs of her customers. She wants to make her business sustainable and to have good living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cookies and some cloth to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweaters for her thread-making business

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Restauratrice de profession,  Amélé revend  du haricot cuit à son domicile depuis 2008. Âgée de 43 ans, Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le tout premier est âgé de 15 ans et le dernier a 09 ans. Elle sollicite son cinquième auprès de WAGES pour l’achat du haricot. Elle compte sur ses bénéfices pour agrandir son activité et assurer les besoins élémentaires de sa famille.
texts.en: A restauranteur by trade, Amélé has been selling cooked beans at her house since 2008. She is 43 years old, married, and the mother of three children. The first child is 15 years old, and the last is 9. Amélé is requesting her fifth loan from WAGES to purchase beans. She intends to use her profits to expand her business and ensure her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase beans for her catering business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, flour, cooking oil, pasta, broths, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.

loans.name: Aoussi

texts.fr: Aoussi est une revendeuse d’igname depuis l’année 2000 dans un marché de la place. Âgée  de 47 ans, elle est mariée et est mère de 02 enfants qui ne sont plus scolarisés. L’ainé est âgé de 25 ans et le benjamin  a 22 ans. Dans le but d’élargir son activité, elle sollicite son troisième prêt auprès de WAGES pour l’achat d’ignames. Il désire  utiliser les profits supplémentaires pour  assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille et pour l’épargne.
texts.en: Aoussi has been a yam seller since 2000 at a local market. She is 47 years old, married, and the mother of two children, who are no longer in school. The oldest is 25 years old, and the youngest is 22. With the goal of expanding her business, Aoussi is requesting her third loan from WAGES to purchase yams. She wishes to use the additional profits to ensure that her family's vital needs are met and to save money.

loans.use: to purchase yams

loans.name: Koufoula

texts.fr: Épouse de militaire, Koufoula est une mère de 42 ans ayant 02 enfants tous scolarisés. Ces derniers sont respectivement âgés de 20 et 17 ans. Elle commercialise des pagnes et bazins à son domicile et a entamé ce commerce depuis 2009. Elle sollicite son second crédit auprès de WAGES pour acheter de tissu pagne et basin en vue d‘agrandir son activité et assurer les besoins élémentaires de la famille.
texts.en: Married to a soldier, Koufoula is a 42-year-old mother who has two children, both in school. The children are 20 and 17 years old. Koufoula sells 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) and damasks at her house. She started this business in 2009. She is requesting he second loan from WAGES to purchase some 'pagne' cloth and damasks with the aim of expanding her business and ensuring that her family's basic needs are met.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, 'pagne' cloth, and damasks

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Marié et père de 04 enfants, Kossi est un revendeur de vaisselles en verres, des produits d’alimentation générale, d’appareils électriques et divers. Parmi ses enfants, 03 sont scolarisés et le premier a 17 ans tandis que le dernier a 04 ans. Il dispose d’une boutique où il emploie une personne. Il sollicite son second prêt auprès de WAGES pour l’achat de vaisselles en verres afin d’agrandir son activité. Comme perspectives, il souhaite diversifier ses marchandises et assurer les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: A married father of four, Kossi buys and resells glass dishware, general food products, electric appliances, and various items. Three of his children are in school. The eldest is 17 and the youngest is 4. Kossi has a boutique where he employs one person. He is requesting his second loan from WAGES for the purchase of glass dishware in order to expand his business. For the future, he wants to diversify his merchandise and provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy dishes, glasses, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy products (oil, flour, beans, stocks, rice, sugar and others)

loans.name: Zelia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos, um já maior de idade o outro ainda frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta uma irmã que vive com ela.
É cabeleireira e dona do seu salão. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos de beleza (perfumes, vernizes, vitaminas, massagens, extensões, mechas e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja montar outro salão mais sofisticado com mais serviços, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de capital suficiente para poder garantir o crescimento do seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's married and has two children. One of them is already an adult and the other one still attends school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a sister who lives with her.
She's a hairdresser who owns her own beauty parlor. With this loan she intends to purchase beauty products (perfumes, nail polish, vitamins, massages, hair extensions, hair weaves, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to set up another, more sophisticated salon which can provide more services. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is lacking enough capital to ensure the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products (perfumes, nail polish, vitamins, massages, hair extensions, hair weaves, etc.).

loans.name: Elisa

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 5 filhos, já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ela.
É criadora de frangos de corte para venda. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, vacinas, rações e vitaminas para aumentar a sua criação de frangos. 
No futuro deseja construir mais aviários e melhores, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de capital suficiente para poder garantir o crescimento do seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's a widow and has five children who are already adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports two grandchildren who live with her.
She raises broiler chickens for selling. With this loan she intends to purchase chicks, vaccines, feed and vitamins in order to enlarge her chicken farm.
In the future she wishes to build more and better aviaries. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is lacking enough capital to ensure the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to raise chickens (by purchasing chicks, feed and vitamins).

loans.name: Suzana

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 2 filhos, que ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustentam mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona de negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, óleo, farinha, feijão, caldos, arroz, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a ampliação da sua casa e investir ainda mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para ampliar o seu negócio e cobrir as despesas de casa uma vez que não tem com que dividir estas despesas.
texts.en:
Suzana is a widow and the mother of 2 children who are still at School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a business woman and owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she plans to buy products (drinks, oil, flour, beans, stocks, rice, sugar and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to complete the expansion of her house and invest even more in her business. To this end she commits to duly paying off this loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to expand her business and cover household expenses, as she doesn't have anyone to share the expenses with.

loans.use: buy products (drinks, oil, flour, beans, stocks, rice, sugar and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, que ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não tem mais dependentes.
É negociante vende produtos alimentares diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (feijão, arroz, massas, sabão, caldos, farinha e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar a produtividade no seu negócio e baixar a dependência nos empréstimos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o baixo nível do capital que usa no seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children who still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't have other dependents.
She's a retailer who sells various foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (beans, rice, pasta, soap, broths, flour, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to increase productivity in her business and become less dependant on loans. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the low level of capital for using in her business.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (beans, rice, pasta, soap, broths, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos, que ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (pão, massas, refrescos, óleo, caldos, arroz, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade e diversificar da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a construção do seu estabelecimento comercial e investir ainda mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de capital suficiente para realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's married and has three children who still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a retailer who owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (bread, pasta, refreshments, cooking oil, broths, rice, sugar, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to finish building her store and to invest even more in her business. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is not having enough capital to implement her projects.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (bread, pasta, refreshments, cooking oil, broths, rice, sugar, etc.).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, butter, milk, pasta, soap, broths, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.fr: Jeune marié de 27 ans sans enfant, Ahmed est un réparateur  et revendeur  de téléphones  portables et accessoires. Il pratique cette activité installé dans une boutique de la place depuis 2008. Il sollicite son premier emprunt auprès de WAGES pour renforcer son stock de téléphones  portables et accessoires et pour réaliser plus de profit qui lui permettra d’épargner. Agrandir son activité et assurer la sécurité alimentaires de sa famille, telles sont ces perspectives d’avenir.
texts.en: A young married man, 27 years old and without children, Ahmed repairs and sells mobile phones and accessories. He has been operating this business in a local shop since 2008. He is requesting his first loan from WAGES to bolster his stock of mobile phones and accessories and to make more profit enabling him to save money. His future plans include expanding his business and ensuring his family's food security.

loans.use: to purchase telephones

loans.name: Albertina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, 3 já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vacinas e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação.  
No futuro deseja empenhar-se ainda mais na sua criação de frangos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de capital suficiente para realizar seus projectos.
texts.en: Married and the mother of 4 children, 3 of whom are now adults, she lives in her own home with her family and does not have any others to support.  Albertina is a marketer and business owner.  With this loan, she plans to buy chicks, feed, vaccines and vitamins to increase the production of the chickens.  In the future, she wants to engage even more in the production of chickens, for which she is committed to repaying the loan in order to request further loans with Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to carry out her projects.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, vaccines and vitamins to boost production of chickens

loans.name: Baptista

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho, que ainda frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não tem mais dependentes.
É electricista auto há bastante tempo. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar óleos, fios, ferramentas e outros para melhorar a sua prestação de serviços. 
No futuro deseja construir um lugar cómodo e seguro para realizar a sua actividade sem riscos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para adquirir o material necessário para realizar a sua actividade com mais perfeição.
texts.en: Married with one school age son, he lives in his own home with his family, and has no other dependents.  Baptista has been an auto electrician for a long time. With this loan, he plans to buy oil, wires and other tools to improve his service delivery.  In the future, he wants to build a comfortable and safe place to conduct business without risks.  He is committed to repaying the loan in order to request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is the lack of funds to buy the necessary materials to conduct business more efficiently.

loans.use: to buy oil, wires, and other tools to improve their service delivery.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos, que ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante vende produtos alimentares diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (leite, açúcar, arroz, farinha, óleo, massas, caldos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar a capacidade da seu negócio para poder garantir aumento do seu rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de capital suficiente para poder garantir o crescimento do seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's married and has three children who still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a retailer who sells various foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (milk, sugar, rice, flour, cooking oil, pasta, broths, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business in order to ensure an increase in her profits. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is lacking enough capital to ensure the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (milk, sugar, rice, flour, cooking oil, pasta, broths, etc.).

loans.name: Josefina

texts.pt:
Casada maritalmente e mãe de 4 filhos, alguns ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração, vacinas e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação.  
No futuro deseja melhorar a sua vida e empenhar-se ainda mais na sua criação de frangos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de espaço próprio para a criação de mais frangos.
texts.en:
Josefina is married and the mother of 4 children, some of whom still attend School. She lives in her own house and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a businesswoman and owns her own business. With this loan she plans to buy chicks, ration, vaccines and vitamins to increase her production.

In future she hopes to improve her life and dedicate herself even more to breeding chickens. To this end she commits to duly paying off this loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the lack of her own space for breeding more chickens.

loans.use: buy chicks, ration, vaccines and vitamins to increase her production of chicken.

loans.name: Siankoa

texts.fr: Revendeuse de céréales et de tubercules depuis 1980 à domicile, madame siankoa âgée de 49ans est mariée et mère de famille.  Ses enfants vont à l’école. Madame Siankoa s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les villes de l’intérieur.  A cause de la qualité des produits, elle a des clients de parts et d’autres de la ville de Lomé. Vu que la demande de ces derniers augmente de jour en jour, elle sollicite auprès de WAGES un premier prêt pour acheter plus de marchandises. Elle voudrait avec les profits, agrandir son activité tout en assurant le bien être de la famille.
texts.en: A buyer and reseller of grains and tubers from her home since 1980, Madame Siankoa, age 49, is a married mother. Her children are in school. Siankoa buys her products in Lomé and in the surrounding towns. Because of the quality of her products, she has clients from near and far. Because her customers' demand is increasing every day, she is requesting her first loan from WAGES for the purchase of more merchandise. She would like to use her profits to expand her business and ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy grains and tubers.

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos, que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio de venda de bebidas e produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cerveja, refrescos, sumos, farinha, peixe, feijão e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.  
No futuro deseja desenvolver ainda mais a sua actividade comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para a realização de seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Married and the mother of two school age children, Cacilda lives in her own home with her family and does not support anyone else. She is a marketer and owner of a business selling drinks and food. With this loan, she plans to buy food products (beer, soft drinks, juices, flour, fish, beans, etc.) to increase the amount of her merchandise.
In the future, she wants to further develop her business, for which she is committed to pay off the loan in order to request future loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to carry out her dreams.

loans.use: to buy and sell food products (beer, soft drinks, juices, flour, fish, beans, etc.)

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Jeune dame de 25ans, célibataire et sans enfants, Afi exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente des sacs en plastiques.  Elle exerce cette activité  dans un marché de la ville de Lomé depuis 2010 et s’approvisionne au même lieu. Elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des sachets en plastiques afin de revendre et gagner un bénéfice pour se prendre en charge et faire évoluer son activité.
texts.en: A young woman of 25, single and with no children, Afi runs a business selling plastic bags. She has sold her bags in a market in Lomé, which is where she also buys her products, since 2010. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES for the purchase of plastic bags in order to re-sell them and make an income in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 2 filhos, já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustentam mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio de venda de bebidas e produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (sumos, farinha, peixe, feijão, refrescos, cervejas, vinhos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.  
No futuro deseja diversificar ainda mais o seu produto e aumentar a quantidade da mercadoria, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e a falta de fundos suficientes para a realização de seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Albertina is a widow and the mother of 2 children who are already of age, lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a trader and owns her own business selling drinks and food. With this loan she plans to buy products (juices, flour, fish, beans, sodas, beer, wine and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to diversify her product offering even more and increase the quantity of her stock. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the high cost of living and the lack of sufficient funds to make her dreams a reality.

loans.use: buy products (juices, flour, fish, beans, sodas, beer, wine and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho, que frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com o seu filho e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante e dona de negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (roupas, feijão, refrescos, cervejas, farinha, arroz e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.  
No futuro deseja apostar ainda mais na sua actividade comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a concorrência e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
Florinda is single and the mother of 1 son who attends School, lives in her own house with her son and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a trade and owns a business selling various products. With this loan she intends to buy products (clothes, beans, sodas, cherries, flour, rice and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hope to bet even more on her commercial activity and to this end, she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the competition and the high cost of living.

loans.use: buy products (clothes, beans, sodas, cherries, flour, rice and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Ilda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos, que ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona de negócio de venda de mariscos e produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (peixe, camarão, lulas, refrescos, óleo, caldos, arroz, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade e diversificar da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja investir ainda mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o fraco mercado e pouca procura para mariscos.
texts.en:
Ilda is married and the mother of 2 children who still attend School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

Ilda is a trader and owns a business selling seafood and various products. With this loan she plans to buy products (fish, shrimp, squid, sodas, oil, stocks, rice, sugar and others) to increase the quantity of her stock and diversify her products.

In future she hopes to invest even more in her business and to this end, she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the weak market and the lack of demand for seafood.

loans.use: buy products (fish, shrimp, squid, sodas, oil, stocks, rice, sugar and others) to increase the quantity of her stock and diversify her products.

loans.name: Claudia Veronica

texts.es:
Claudia, casada, madre de un hijos de 6 años, originaria de León, se dedica a atender una abarrotería. Ella cuenta que su experiencia con el crédito kiva le ayudo a surtir más su negocio de verduras, productos de limpieza, cosméticos consiguió nuevos clientes, pero noto la necesidad de ofrecer más variedad y precios más accesible debido a la situación económica, es por ello que siempre está en busca de productos frescos de buena calidad y que le permitan venderlos a mejores precios.
Está requiriendo un crédito para comprar más productos tales como frutas, verduras, detergentes, jabones, avenas, aceite y granos básicos. Pues son parte de los productos que más le demandan su clientela.
texts.en: Claudia is married and the mother of a six-year-old son.  She’s from León and is a grocer.  She relates that her experience with the Kiva loan helped her better stock her store with vegetables, cleaning supplies and cosmetics and she won over new customers but she noticed that she needed to offer still more variety and more affordable prices due to the economic situation which is why she’s always on the lookout for fresh, good quality products that she can sell at better prices.  She needs a loan to buy more products like fruit, vegetables, detergents, soap, oats, oil and basic grains because they are some of the products most in demand by her customers.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, detergent, soap, oats, oil and basic grains.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits de mercerie dans une boutique depuis 1996, madame Afi née en 1964 est mère de 03 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs d'école. Son conjoint est enseignant. Afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des articles de mercerie. comme perspectives d'avenir, elle veut diversifier son stock et assurer les moindres besoins de la famille.
texts.en: A buyer and reseller of haberdashery items in a boutique since 1996, Madame Afi, born in 1964, has three children, two of whom are in school. Her husband is a teacher. In order to better respond to her customers' needs, she is requesting her second loan from WAGES for the purchase of haberdashery items. For the future, she wants to diversity her merchandise and ensure her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery items.

loans.name: Messanh

texts.fr: Menssah est marié à une coiffeuse. Ils ont 04 enfants dont 03 scolarisés. Menssanh est déclarant en douanes et revendeur des pneus pour camions dans la zone portuaire depuis 2009. Ain d’acheter des pneus pour revendre à ses clients, il sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour atteindre cet objectif. Avec les profits, il  veut réinvestir au mieux dans l’activité et assurer les besoins primaires de la famille. Il est âgé de 34ans.
texts.en: Messanh is married to a hairdresser. They have four children, three of whom are at school. Messanh is a customs broker and has also been selling truck tyres in the port area since 2009. In order to buy tyres to resell to his customers, he is requesting a first loan from WAGES. With the profits he makes, he wants to reinvest as much as possible in his busness and provide for his family's basic needs. He is 34 years old.

loans.use: to buy tyres.

loans.name: Mawunyo

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 27ans, Mawunyo est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfant en charge. Il est revendeur de profession et revend des produits d’alimentation générale à domicile depuis 2011. Il s’approvisionne généralement chez les grossistes au Grand Marché et sollicite son second crédit à WAGES  pour acheter des produits d’alimentation générale(riz, tomate en boite, huile végétale …..). Disposer d’une autre boutique, se marier et avoir des enfants, telles sont les perspectives d’avenir de mr Mawunyo.
texts.en: A young 27 year old man, Mawunyo is not married and has no dependent children. He is a reseller by profession and has been reselling general foodstuffs from home since 2011. He usually stocks up at the wholesalers at the Grand Market and is requesting his second loan from WAGES to buy general foodstuffs (rice, canned tomatoes, vegetable oil...). The future hopes of Mawunyo are to have another boutique and to get married and have children.

loans.use: to buy general foodstuffs.

loans.name: Akua

texts.fr: Revendeuse de charbons de bois à domicile, madame Akou est mariée à un professeur d’école Âgée de 45ans, elle est mère de 03 enfants tous à  l’école. L’ainé est âgé de 13ans et le dernier 06ans. Afin d’acheter des charbons de bois, elle fait un premier crédit à WAGES.  Les profits tirés de cette vente l’aideront à acheter en quantité considérable les charbons de bois et satisfaire les besoins de la famille. Elle a  une ancienneté de 02ans.
texts.en: A buyer and reseller of charcoal from her home, Madame Akou is married to a school teacher. Aged 45, she is a mother of three children, all of whom are in school. The eldest is 13 and the youngest is 6. In order to buy charcoal, she is taking out her first loan from WAGES. The profit from these sales will allow her to buy a considerable amount of charcoal and provide for her family's needs. She has two years' experience.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr: Koffi est âgé de 29ans. Il est marié à une revendeuse et a 01 enfant. Il est main tenancier de profession. Il répare et vend des portables et ses accessoires dans la zone portuaire.  Afin d’acheter des marchandises, mr Koffi sollicite un troisième crédit à WAGES.  Il veut épargner les profits, ouvrir une boutique de vente de portables et prendre soin de la famille. Il a une ancienneté de 10ans dans l’activité.
texts.en: Koffi is 29. He is married to a retailer and has one child. He repairs products for a living; he repairs and sells cell phones and cell phone accessories. In order to buy merchandise, Mr. Koffi is requesting his third loan from WAGES. He wants to save the income he makes from it and open a cell phone store. He also wants to take care of his family. He has ten years' experience in this business.

loans.use: to buy cell phones and accessories.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de charbons de bois à domicile, madame Akouavi est mariée à un retraité. Âgée de 53ans, elle est mère de 05 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs d’école. Afin d’acheter des charbons de bois, elle fait un premier crédit à WAGES.  Les profits tirés de cette vente l’aideront à acheter en quantité considérable les charbons de bois et satisfaire les besoins de la famille. Elle a  une ancienneté de 02ans.
texts.en:
Reseller of charcoal from her home, Akouavi is married to a retiree. Fifty-three years old, she is mother to 5 children of whom 2 go to school. In order to buy charcoal, she is taking a first loan from WAGES. 

The profits made from these sales will help her to buy charcoal in considerable quantities and to satisfy the needs of her family. She has 2 years experience.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hosiery products.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo âgée de 33ans vit à Lomé avec son conjoint enseignant et leurs 02 enfants. Ils sont âgés respectivement de 09 et 06ans. Son activité s’est basée sur la vente des sachets plastiques et d'autres produits. Elle le fait dans un marché de la place avec sa sœur. Afin d’acheter des sachets plastiques, elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour s’approvisionner. L’ouverture d’une boutique et l’assurance d’une bonne scolarisation des enfants sont les perspectives d’avenir de madame Adjo. Elle a une ancienneté de 05ans dans l’activité.
texts.en:
Adjo is 33 years old and lives in Lomé with her teacher spouse and their 2 children. They are 6 and 9 years old respectively. Her business is based on the sale of plastic bags and other products. She sells at a local market with her sister.

In order to buy plastic bags, she is requesting a first loan from WAGES to stock up. The future prospects of Adjo are to open a boutique and to ensure a good schooling for her children. She has 5 years experience in her business.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags.

loans.name: Togbe

texts.fr: Mr togbé est âgé de 62ans. Il est père de 07ans dont 01 seul scolarisé. Sa femme est revendeuse. Comme profession, il a appris la couture et l’exerce dans un atelier. 03 personnes l’aident dans l’exécution de son activité. Il a reçu une commande d’une société mais manquant de fonds pour répondre à ce besoin, il fait un crédit à WAGES pour acheter des tissus pour confectionner des vestes et pantalons. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, bien suivre l’éducation de sa benjamine et assurer sa santé grâce aux profits réalisés.
texts.en: Mr Togbé is 62. He has seven children, only one of whom is in school. His wife is a retailer. He learned sewing as a profession and has his own workshop. He has three helpers in his business. He has received an order from a group, but he does not have enough funds to respond. He is taking out a loan from WAGES in order to buy fabric for making jackets and pants. With his profits, wants to re-invest in his business, provide for the education of his youngest daughter, and ensure his family's health.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Dushirehamwe Group

texts.fr:
Diane fait partie du groupe  Dushirehamwe et  habite à Ngozi. Elle a 30 ans et mariée à Patrice qui fait le commerce de restaurant.Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 1à 12 ans, dont 2 étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce de  restaurant  depuis 10 ans. 

Elle est à son neuvième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de produits vivriers (colocases, haricot, riz,…) à revendre cuits dans son restaurant.

 Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  avoir sa propre boutique, et voir ses enfants étudier et continuer les études.
texts.en:
Diane is part of the Dushirehamwe group and lives in Ngozi. She is 30 and married to Patrice, who is in the restaurant business. They have four children from the ages of 1 to 12. Two are in school.
She has been in the restaurant business for ten years.
This is her ninth loan with Turame. With this loan, she will increase her capital and buy a large quantity of food products (taros, beans, rice...) to cook and sell in her restaurant.
In the upcoming years, she would like to have her own boutique and see her children continue with their education.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of food items (taros, beans, rice...) to cook and sell in her restaurant.

loans.name: Nadou

texts.fr: Mariée à un employé et mère d’un enfant de 18ans scolarisé, Nadou âgée de 52ans est revendeuse de profession. Elle est revend des charbons de bois au marché,s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les villes de l’intérieur. Son second crédit qu’elle sollicite à WAGES lui servira à acheter des sacs de charbons de bois, revendre et tirer des profits pour réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer les besoins primaires de la famille.
texts.en: Nadou, who is married to an employee and is mother to an 18-year old child who is at school, is 52 years old and a retailer by trade. She sells charcoal in the market and gets her supplies in Lomé and in inland towns. The second loan she is requesting from WAGES will be used to buy sacks of charcoal for resale so she can bring in sufficient profits to reinvest in the business and provide for her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Mère de 04 enfants âgés de 13, 11,10 et 08ans tous scolarisés, akouvi a pour mari un revendeur. Elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus du jus, de l’eau, du glaçon dans les écoles et à la maison. C’est en 2003 qu’elle a démarré l’activité et elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter un congélateur. Avec les profits qu’elle va réaliser, elle veut ouvrir une boutique et prendre soin de la famille. Elle est âgée de 42ans.
texts.en: Akouvi is mother to four children aged 13, 11, ten and eight years old respectively, who are all at school. Her husband is a retailer. She has an income-generating activity selling juice, water and ice in schools and at home. She began this activity in 2003 and is requesting a first loan from WAGES to buy a freezer. With the profits she makes she would like to open a shop and take care of her family. She is 42 years old.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Mélégan

texts.fr: Âgée de 32ans, madame mélégan est mère de 02 enfants tous scolarisés. Le premier est âgé de 10ans et le dernier 06ans. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et celui des enfants, elle vend depuis 2003 des sacs de sortie (friperie). Activité qu’elle mène dans un quartier de la place seule sur étalage. Elle sollicite un second crédit de WAGES pour acheter des marchandises afin de revendre aux clients dans le besoin. Elle veut épargner les profits, ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter.
texts.en: Mélégan is 32 years old and mother to two children who go to school. The eldest is ten years old and the youngest six. In order to provide for her needs and those of her children, she has been selling bags (second-hand) since 2003. She carries out this activity alone on a stall in a local neighborhood. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy goods for resale to customers who need them. She wants to save the profits and open a ready-to-wear shop.

loans.use: to buy second-hand bags.

loans.name: Afiavi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de tubercules et de maïs à domicile, afiavi est mariée à un revendeur et ils ont ensemble un enfant de 07ans qui va à l’école. Afin de renforcer son activité, elle fait un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises (mais et tubercules). Avec les profits dérivés de cette activité, elle veut agrandir son activité en ouvrant un magasin, acheter un terrain pour construire sa maison plus tard. Elle est âgée de 34ans.
texts.en: A reseller of tubers and corn from her home, Afiavi is married to a reseller and they have a 7 year old child who goes to school together. In order to strengthen her business, she is taking a first loan from WAGES to buy merchandise (corn and tubers). With the profits that she makes from this business, she wants to expand her business by opening a store, and later buy land to build her house. She is 34 years old.

loans.use: to buy tubers and corn.

loans.name: Flores De Ventilla Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE VENTILLA”  iniciará el ciclo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sara es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cotillones, taller de tejido, venta de cosméticos, venta de ropa americana, tienda de barrio, Internet.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sara es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de nuestra institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de cotillones y producción de joyas; cuenta que estos negocio los emprendió por enseñanza de sus amigas y algunos cursos técnicos mismos que le ayudaron a tener mas seguridad de la apertura de su tienda.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cartones, papel y pólvora) que adquirirá de las ferias de la Ciudad de El Alto por mayor y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su puesto de venta o de forma ambulante en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en unión y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que el servicio médico.
texts.en:
The "Flor de Ventilla" Communal Bank will initiate its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Regional Office of Senkata. The bank is composed of eight members and is run by a board of directors, of which Sara is president. The businesses which the communal bank's members run are varied. Among them are the sale of party favors, cosmetics, American clothing, and Internet services, as well as a fabric workshop and a neighborhood store.

This loan will benefit small business owners, of which Sara is a member. This is the first time that she is working with Pro Mujer, which she joined by invitation of one of the institution's promoters. She currently runs a business in which she sells party favors and produces jewelry. She says that she launched this business by learning from her friends and taking some technical courses, which helped her to have more confidence when opening her store.

The loan which she has requested is to increase her capital by buying cartons, paper, and gunpowder, which she will purchase wholesale from the markets in the city of El Alto. After production, she will sell the products in her stall or at a street market. This line of work allows her to generate income to support her household in every way possible. She lives in a common-law marriage and has three children.

When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the medical services.

loans.use: to buy cartons, paper, and gunpowder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farm.

loans.name: Cruz Rosendo

texts.es:
El joven Cruz Rosendo esta soltero, tiene  20 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educacion primaria, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa de varias clases, inicio este negocio gracias alk apoyo de sus familiares y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para aumentar su capital de trabajo, quiere comprar mas mercadería, ya que entre mas inversión realiza mas serán sus ganancias. espera seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en:
Cruz Rosendo, who is a young, single 20-year-old, has a third grade education.  He is a merchant and sells all kinds of clothing, having started his business two years ago with the support of his family.

He is requesting a loan to increase his working capital and buy more merchandise so he can expand his business and increase profits.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Norma Maria

texts.es: La señora Norma, tiene la edad de 36 años, su compañero de vida conductor de bus, ahora departamental el ayuda en gastos de la casa, continua siempre con la venta de ropa, cosméticos, calzado prendas de plata, tiene 2 hijos menores de 14 años de edad, ella los saco adelante con trabajos en una zona franca como operaria de maquina pero se tuvo que retirar porque estaba descuidando a sus hijos. Este es su octavo crédito que solicita para aumentar su inventario comprando zapatos de damas y caballeros, ropa, perfumes entre otros para poder cubrir encargos de sus clientes, y así lograr crecer su negocio para poder construir su casa poco a poco, ya que la tiene elaborada de zinc y es muy vulnerable ante las lluvias y demasiado caliente en el día.
texts.en:
Norma, 36, and her husband who is a bus driver, share the cost of running the household.  She continues to sell clothing, cosmetics, shoes and silver articles.  She has two children under 14 years of age who she has supported through her work as a machine operator in the tax-free zone.  She had to retire from the job, however, to care for her children.  

This is her eighth loan and she plans to use it to buy women's and men's shoes, clothing, perfumes, etc. to fill customer orders.  This will allow her to expand her business so she can build a house little by little.  The one she lives in now is made of corrugated metal making it is very vulnerable in rainy situations and too hot during the day.

loans.use: To buy women's and men's shoes, clothing, perfumes and other items.

loans.name: Sara Emperatriz

texts.es: Sara Emperatriz vive junto a su compañero de vida Antonio, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado, camisas, pantalones, vestidos entre otros , tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde un puesto en el mercado de la localidad donde reside, es muy conocida y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios, y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Sara es una mujer alegre, confiable, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, le gusta luchar por lo que desea y dia a dia se esfuerza con amor y constancia porque sabe que así logrará el éxito que tanto desea, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y calzado. Sara Emperatriz tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una  mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sara Emperatriz lives with her partner Antonio.  She sells clothes and footwear, shirts, pants, dresses, and so on.  She has been doing this business for some time, and she has a lot of experience in sales that allows her to make the best money possible.  She sells from a stall in her local market.  She is well-known and has a large clientele that patronize her for the quality and good prices of her merchandise, but, above all, for her excellent service. Sarah is a happy, reliable, and enterprising woman with a strong desire to get ahead.  She likes to fight for what she wants, and every day she carefully and lovingly pushes herself because she knows that this is how she will achieve the success she wants.  

In recent weeks, demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage of this fact to make a new investment.  For this reason, she has asked Kiva partner INTEGRAL for a loan so she can buy clothing in bulk and footwear. Sara Emperatriz has a good payment history and an unsullied record.  She promises to pay off her debt, while at the same time offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk and footwear.

loans.name: Ricardo  Jose

texts.es: El señor Ricardo, tiene 38 años, soltero, sin hijos experimento diferentes tipos de trabajos como joyerías, tuvo unos billares y ninguno le dieron buenos resultados, ultimadamente se dedica a la vulcanización hace 2 años el cual le va muy bien y para seguir aumentando sus ingresos económicos solicita su segundo crédito que solicita para poder comprar 15 llantas usadas en buen estado para el negocio, porque también las vende y quiere invertir en lubricantes, sus planes para en un futuro es agrandar el negocio y formar una familia.
texts.en: Ricardo, 38, is single and has no children.  He has experience working in different areas, such as jewelry and pool hall activities, but has never gotten good results. For the last two years he has been working in the tire repair business and it is going well for him.  To continue increasing his income he is requesting a loan to buy 15 used tires and lubricants to sell.  His plans for the future are to expand the business and form a family.

loans.use: To buy 15 used tires and lubricants.

loans.name: Santos Alberto

texts.es: El señor Santos de familia agricultora, dio inicio desde muy joven esta actividad con el que con mucho esfuerzo saco adelante a sus 7 hijos quienes ahora son mayores de edad ninguno dependen de él, a sus 66 años de edad sigue trabajando arduamente, este es su crédito número 14 que solicita porque lo requiere para la adquisición de insumos agropecuarios para darle manejo agronómico a su cultivo de una manzana de pitahaya, para dicho objetivo comprara urea, abono e insecticidas y así mejorar su cultivo, su esposa es ama de casa se encarga de darle el buen funcionamiento y orden del hogar, su principal obstáculo que ha tenido fue la falta de financiamiento, pero gracias a dios eso fue solo una barrera que ahora está solucionado gracias al apoyo crediticio que brinda Afodenic por medio de fondos Kiva, en sus planes futuros esta el sembrar más variedad de frutas.
texts.en:
Santos is from a farming family and began this activity when he was very young.  With a lot of effort he has been able to raise seven children who are now adults and live independently.  At 66 years of age he continues working hard and this is his 14th loan.  He is in need of farm supplies to maintain his cactus fruit crop, and plans to buy urea, fertilizer and insecticides for crop improvement.  His wife is a homemaker who keeps things running smoothly at home.  

The main obstacle he has run into has been lack of financing, but thankfully that is being taken care of now with a Kiva loan through Afodenic.  In the future he would like to plant a variety of fruit.

loans.use: To buy urea, fertilizer and insecticides.

loans.name: Baltazar

texts.es: Baltazar de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida, él se dedica a la venta de comida carne, sopas, ensaladas, arroz, bebidas, entre otros, tiene varios años en el negocio  y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la cocina y eso le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; el comedor esta ubicado en su residencia y es muy conocido en la zona, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio accesible; Baltazar se caracteriza por su alegría y amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, todos los días se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que así alcanzara el éxito que tanto desea, en las  ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, verduras, carnes, bebidas, etc. Baltazar tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Baltazar, 32, lives with his common-law wife and runs a food business, selling items such as meat, soups, salads, rice, beverages, etc.  He has been in business for several years and has a lot of experience in the kitchen, which helps increase his earnings.  The business is set up in his home, and is very popular in the area.  He has many customers who prefer his product quality, low prices and good service.

Baltazar is very cheerful and kind.  He is an entrepreneur who is dedicated to his job and very determined to get ahead.  Every day he does his utmost because he knows that is the way to be successful, which is what he aims for most.

Lately, he has noticed an increase in demand and wants to take advantage of the opportunity to make a new investment.  He is in need of capital and is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to help buy basic grains, vegetables, meat, beverages, etc.  Baltazar has a good credit record and is committed to paying back the loan.  He also is confident he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, vegetables, meat and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add one more cow to the herd.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine wholesale.

loans.name: Pjeter

texts.en:
Pjeter has been a successful beekeeper in his rural home of the northwest district for twenty-five years. He started before the collapse of regime with only one hive and has added more throughout the years. Pjeter is 44, married and has two young children; 7 and 3 years old. He sells honey in large quantities to the local market and with the profit he has been making, Pjeter has invested it in building a family house.

Pjeter has now requested a loan of 200,000 LEK from VisionFund Albania to help him add some more beehives. He says he wants to save his honey income to enable him finish the house for his family and establish a larger beehive business where he will employ others to assist him.

loans.use: to buy some more beehives.

loans.name: Mbinga Group

texts.en:
Mwangaza, who is in her 30s, is married with a boy who is still goes to school. She has had a general store (retail shop selling different items) business since 2007. She works from 6am to 10pm daily and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase her retail shop inventory, pay school fees and household expenses and she has paid back her loan successfully. She wants a loan to buy more inventory to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

She will share this loan with her loan group" Mbinga" which totals 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her shop.

loans.name: Orlando De Jesús

texts.es:
Orlando tiene 33 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es una persona que se dedica a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus padres, él junto a su familia trabajan 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz. Él junto a su familia se levantan a las 3:00 a.m. a ordeñar las vacas, luego se llevan los animales a pastar cerca de donde tienen el cultivo, caminan cerca de tres kilómetros para llegar al terreno en donde tienen sus cultivos. 

Para adquirir los insumos agrícolas don Orlando debe caminar dos kilómetros, hasta llegar al lugar donde espera el autobús que lo conduce a  la ciudad.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar insumos agrícolas para los 21,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, ya que los insumos los compra al crédito y le salen más caros. Con el préstamo quiere adquirirlos de contado para ahorrar en la compra y por consiguiente recibir un mejor margen de ganancia para llevar el sustento diario a su familia y poder comprar más vacas y aumentar la producción de leche. Su deseo es comprar un terreno para construir su casa, ya que en donde viven es alquilado.
texts.en:
Orlando is 33 years old, married and has two children. He works in agriculture, a profession which he learned from his parents. Together with the family, they work 21,000 meters squared of corn. He, along with his family, gets up at 3am to milk the cows. Later they bring the animals to graze near where they have the crops. They walk close to three kilometers to arrive at the fields where they have their crops.
To obtain the agricultural inputs, Orlando has to walk two kilometers to the place where he waits for the bus that will bring him to the city.
The loan that he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy agricultural inputs for the 21,000 square meters of corn, since the inputs bought on credit are more expensive. With the loan, he wants to buy them with cash to save on the costs and as a result obtain a better profit margin to provide for his family and to be able to buy more cows and increase the milk production. His desire is to buy land to build a house, since where they live is rented

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for 21,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Julio César

texts.es:
Julio tiene 38 años de edad, es acompañado. Es una persona trabajadora que se dedica al comercio de zapatos desde hace seis años. Él vende en diferentes lugares. El negocio lo aprendió gracias a un amigo que se dedica a lo mismo. Posteriormente por su propia iniciativa, decide emprender el negocio que es muy rentable. Antes Julio se dedicaba a realizar trabajos agrícolas, gracias a esa actividad logro proporcionar lo necesario a su familia y el estudio a sus hijos.  

Para adquirir los zapatos, julio viaja a la capital del país, tarda dos horas en llegar en autobús, luego tarda unos cuarenta y cinco minutos en llegar al mercado en donde compra los zapatos a buen precio. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar más zapatos para surtir el negocio y llegar a más lugares a vender. Su objetivo es incrementar sus ventas, para que sus ingresos sean mucho mejores al ofrecerle a sus clientes variedad y buen servicio, dichos ingresos serán utilizados  para reparar su vehiculo y brindar a su familia lo necesario para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio is thirty-eight years old and in a relationship. He is a hard-working person and has been selling shoes in different places for six years now. He got into this business because of a friend that also sells shoes. Then he started this business, as selling shoes is profitable. Julio’s previous line of work was agriculture, and through it he could cover his family’s needs and pay for his children’s studies.

Julio travels to the capital city to buy shoes. It takes him two hours by bus and then forty-five minutes more to reach the city’s market, where he finds shoes at good prices.

He will use the loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo to buy more shoes and stock his business, in order to expand his coverage. His goal is to increase sales and income, by offering his customers variety and good service. He will use this income to repair his car and to give his family everything they need in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more shoes and stock his business, in order to expand his coverage.

loans.name: Uguloy

texts.ru: Угулой женщина которая очень любит свою семью.   Замужем и имеет пятерых   детей .   Муж по стечению обстоятельств уехал  в Российскою Федерацию и по возможности  каждый месяц отправляет жене денежные средства.  Она сама работает в  магазине  продавщицей.      Ее дочки дома занимаются шитьем национальных платьев.     Одна из дочерей скоро выходит замуж а у Угулой для покупки приданного не хватает денежных средств.    Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд, так как не имеет  другого выхода.    Очень надеется на финансовую поддержку.   Заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Uguloy is married and has five children, whom she loves very much. Due to various circumstances, her husband had to leave to Russia to find work and tries to send them money back every month. Meanwhile, Uguloy works as a cashier in a store. Her daughters sew dresses to make a living. One of her daughters is getting married soon but Uguloy doesn't have enough money for a dowry. She turned to Arvand because she had no other choice. She hopes for your assistance and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to buy gifts for her daughter's wedding.

loans.name: Vibula Group

texts.en:
Mohamed, who is in his mid 30s, is married with a boy and a girl who still go to school. He has had a food shop business for four years now. He works from 6 a.m to 8 p.m.daily, and he is able to make a good monthly profit. 

He has requested a 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to purchase more sacks of rice, sugar, super gates (a kind of Indian food), beans, maize and wheat flour to resell and cover his household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He hopes for a loan to restock more food items to resell. His dream is to one day be able to build a nice house for his family.

He will share this loan with his loan group Vibula, which has 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock more food items.

loans.name: Tugeme Group

texts.en:
Evodia, who is in her late 30s, is single with two boys who are in school. She is earning a living by running a fruit and vegetable business (genge-duka), operating since 2002. She works from 7am to 6pm daily and she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase business stock, pay school fees and household expenses, and buy a TV for her home. She has paid back all her loans successfully. 

She wants a loan to buy more sacks of onions to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to finish building her house and to sell fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Tugeme" which totals 10 members, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of onions to resell.

loans.name: Soli

texts.en:
Mrs.Soli is 50 years old, and lives with her husband in the Hovd province of Mongolia. Her husband name is Bayasgalan, who also helps her business. 

She has been in the dairy products sales business since 2011 in the local market. She is a diligent, hard-working and friendly woman who has gained a lot of trust from his customers; she is experienced in the business. She purchases large amounts of organic dairy products directly from herders in towns closer to the province center; she sells in it at retail prices in the local market. 

She is requesting 1,000,000 MNT to reserve a large amount of organic dairy products to resell during the winter.

loans.use: To reserve a large amount of organic dairy products to sell during the winter

loans.name: Kingugi Group

texts.en:
Monica is in her early 40s and married with two boys who are still going to school.   She has been running two businesses selling vitenge (fabrics) and cosmetics for three years now. She works from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily, and she is able to make a good profit every month.
 
This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She expects to use the loan to buy more vitenge and cosmetics to resell to more customers. Her dream is to one day be able to own a big shop selling her items.

Monica will share this loan with her loan group Kingugi, which has 10 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more vitenge (fabrics) and cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Mloganzila Group

texts.en:
William, who is in his mid 20s, is married and has two girls who are still young. He has been selling fruit for two years now. He works from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. daily and he is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be his 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.   He used the previous loans to buy more fruit, finish building his family house, and cover household expenses and school fees. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He will use his loan to open a new fruit business in another place. His dream is to one day be able to sell fruit at wholesale prices.

He will share this loan with his loan group Mloganzila, which has 14 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to open a new fruit business in a new location.

loans.name: Mgombolwa Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her 40s, is married and has four children (three boys and a girl) who are still in school. She has had a food shop for three years now. She works from 7am to 9pm daily and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more sacks of rice, maize flour and sugar, liters of cooking oil, and cover household expenses. She has paid back her loan successfully. She wants a loan to buy a fridge for her business and to restock more food items in her shop. Her dream is to one day be able to open a new food shop business in another place.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Mgombolwa" which totals 17 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for her business and restock more food items in her shop.

loans.name: Pao

texts.en:
Pao, 44, resides in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She lives there permanently with her spouse and six children. All of them still depend on her income, for they are students at local state schools. However, they always help their parents in managing the family-owned businesses, which include rice farming, pig raising and firewood trading. Pao is the operator of pig-raising business, from which she is able to add to the family’s main income. She has no concerns about her businesses because she has a good business partner, her husband, who is very supportive.

With the requested amount, Pao would like to purchase 10 bags of fertilizer for her crops. This fertilizer will enable her to make her business more productive in the coming season. She hopes for financial stability so that she can continuously support her children’s education. In the future, Pao wishes to have a medium pig farm in her village.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Abdunazar

texts.ru: Абдуназар  женат и  имеет двоих детей .   Обратился в Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.    Он  занимается животноводством более 10 лет.   Он начал свою деятельность с 10 голов скота, а сейчас у Абдуназара их стало больше.    Он старается развивать свой бизнес так как это его единственный доход.    Жена не работает  занимается воспитанием детей.   Так как сам Абдуназар не имеет образования и не учился, он хочет чтобы его дети учились в высших учебных заведениях и работали по профессии.  На полученный кредит Абдуназар планирует купить мелко рогатый скот  и увеличить свое поголовье.  Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и понимание.
texts.en: Abdunazar is married and has two children.  He has approached Arvand for financial support.  He has been raising livestock for more than ten years.  He started his business with 10 head of animals and now his herd has grown.  He is trying to expand his business, as it is his only source of income.  His wife does not work, as she takes care of the children.  Since Abdunazar has not received a higher education, he wants his children to be able to study at university and to find relevant work.  On receiving his loan, Abdunazar plans on buying sheep and goats to increase the size of his herd.  He thanks Arvand in advance for their support and understanding.

loans.use: purchase livestock

loans.name: Yorn

texts.en:
Yorn is a farmer who lives with his family in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. Aside from his farming business, Yorn uses his buffalo and a trailer to transport firewood to the marketplaces for extra income. He typically generates an average of 21,600 KHR per day to cover daily expenses while his wife can earn 6,200 KHR from a pig-raising business. Together, they are responsible for five children, all of whom are attending school.

As of now, he is applying for a loan of 3,000,000 KHR to purchase a buffalo, both for farming and his firewood business. He believes that the income from each business will help him satisfy his living needs and educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase a buffalo for multipurpose, both for farming and firewood trading business.

loans.name: Uth

texts.en:
Uth, 39, finished only a primary education due to her family's financial constraints. This has caused her to get involved in a rice-farming business to support her family, which consists of four children. All of them are students and still depend on her income. With her experiences as a farmer, Uth has developed a strong commitment to improving her farming business so she can earn a better income.

Uth would like to borrow some funds from HKL and Kiva to purchase a cow for her farm. This cow will help her maintain her farm and reduce expenses on plowing fees. Uth has been a VIP and honest client of HKL since her fourth loan, and she hopes that this loan will be approved, too.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for her farm.

loans.name: Mimoza

texts.en:
Mimoza, a 44-year-old married mother of three children ranging in age from 12 to 21, lives in northern Albania. About two months ago, her brother-in-law passed away in a tragic accident. 

For almost one year, he had been working on establishing a pizza restaurant, and it was about to have its grand opening; however, he did not make it. Now, Mimoza wants to continue with his business and start running it soon, both to keep his memory alive and to generate income she did not have before. This restaurant will be the only one of its kind in the town.

To finish the restaurant, Mimoza needs 300,000 ALL. She requested this amount from VisionFund Albania in hopes that her loan information would be published on Kiva for lenders' financial support. Mimoza wants to tell lenders that she appreciates their generosity and kindness and hopes they will lend to her.

loans.use: to open a pizza restaurant on time.

loans.name: Liljana

texts.en:
Liljana, 34, is married and has one child. Her husband, who immigrated long ago to a neighboring country, helped her financially in the beginning, but later stopped coming back. Therefore, she no longer gets any help from him.  

She lives in a little town in northern Albania, where she works full time in a restaurant. She also works in the farming industry, both with livestock and agriculture. The money she makes is enough for her and her son to live on, and she can even save a bit to improve their living conditions. Recently, she wanted to buy some electrical appliances. She thought that she would be able to pay for them in installments, yet she was told that she had to pay the full amount at the time of purchase. 

This is why Liljana is requesting a Kiva loan now. She hopes that the lenders will help her. This would be her third loan from the same institution to which she has proved her responsibility in the past.

loans.use: to buy electrical appliances for her kitchen.

loans.name: Vikindu Group

texts.en:
Maneno, who is in her mid-30s, is married with two children who go to school. She has been running a grocery store where she sells food and drinks for four years now. She works from 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Maneno's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to buy more drinks for the grocery store and pay for some of the household expenses. She has paid back all her loans successfully. She wants a loan to restock the missing items in her grocery store. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

Maneno will share this loan with her loan group, "Vikindu," which has a total of 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two grazing cows

loans.name: Siek

texts.en:
Siek is 39 years old and an industrious father of two school-aged children. A goldsmith, Siek provides services to his customers from a rented booth, where he typically generates an average of 6 USD each day to satisfy his family’s living needs. He has been in this occupation for almost seven years. Siek thanks his wife that she always supports him in finding ways to earn income. Siek and his wife are raising and educating their two children in Dongkor district, Phnom Penh.

Siek would like to set up a retail business for his wife. Due to lack of capital, he is asking for a loan of 500 USD to purchase grocery items such as noodles, snacks, spices, canned food, and beverages to sell in the shop. This generous loan amount will help Siek and his wife start up a new business. They hope for a better income through it and to be able to provide good living conditions for their children.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as noodles, snacks, spices, canned food, and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant crops for seasonal agricultural farming.

loans.name: Him

texts.en:
Him is 33 years old and an industrious woman who farms to generate a source of income for her family. She is married to her spouse of 35 years. He makes mortars and pestles from granite stone. The profit from the two businesses is used to pay for their daily food, electricity bill, commodities and allowance for their school-aged child.

With the loan amount she has requested, Him will buy some tools for her husband to be used in his mortars and pestles business. This will enable him to make his business more productive and a viable source of the family’s income. 

In the future, Him wants to save more money for the expansion of her family-owned businesses.

loans.use: to buy some tools for her husband to be used in his mortars and pestles business.

loans.name: Fatime

texts.en:
A rural villager located in the south central district of Albania, Fatime is a 51-year-old mother of four dependent children. She has been farming on her farmland and also selling milk and other dairy products to locals. Fatime started this activity in her thirties and since then she has been enjoying it. Not only does it keep her busy, but she also generates an income from it. She has been the only one to earn an income for the past few years and that makes her proud of herself.

With a lack of money for her business, Fatime is applying for her first loan with VisionFund Albania. She will use this loan to add some more sheep to the herd she currently has. This loan will enable her to generate more income to better support their living expenses and set aside some money to send her daughter to school.

loans.use: To add more sheep to the herd she currently has.

loans.name: Yarha Group
